original: evaṃ pṛthvīvāyvoḥ pañcakam
analyzed: evam pṛthvī vāyvoḥ pañcakam

analyzed: tathā eva pītānām upāyānām kṛṣṇa varṇāḥ prajñāḥ vara kanaka nibhāḥ potā prajñāḥ ca asitānām iti kṛṣṇānām upāyānām kulānām nīlānām viśva varṇāḥ iti haritā prajñāḥ

original: punarapi haritānāmupāyānāṃ nīlāḥ prajñāstathoktā iti nyāyaḥ
analyzed: punar api haritānām upāyānām nīlāḥ prajñāḥ tathā uktāḥ iti nyāyaḥ

original: parakulāliṅganataḥ kriyāniṣpattiḥ svakulāliṅganena kriyāsiddhirnāsti, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt
analyzed: para kula āliṅganataḥ kriyā niṣpattiḥ sva kula āliṅganena kriyā siddhiḥ na asti sva ātmani kriyā virodhāt

original: na hi bhagajātīyānāṃ dhātūnāṃ bhagacintayā sukhotpādaḥ, evaṃ puruṣa- liṅgajātīnāṃ vā liṅgacintayā sukhotpādaḥ
analyzed: na hi bhaga jātīyānām dhātūnām bhaga cintayā sukha utpādaḥ evam puruṣa liṅga jātīnām vā liṅga cintayā sukha utpādaḥ

original: ataḥ kālacakre svābhāḥ prajñā na bhavanti, svātmani kriyāvirodhāditi

analyzed: iha ādarśe puruṣa pratibimbam na stana keśavatī sadṛśam na api strī bimbam stana yoni rahitam tena su ābha tā na asti

analyzed: atas niḥsvabhāva bhava bhāvanā ghaṭa paṭa śakaṭa senā ādikānām kāryā na prādeśikī sakala loka vyavahāra rahitā iti siddhāntaḥ mādhyamikaḥ mantra naye tattva paṭale nyāyataḥ iti

original: prajñātantraṃ hi pūrvāt punaraparamukhādeva yogānuviddhaṃ savyāsyād yogatantraṃ gadati jinapatirvāmavaktrāt kriyādyam
analyzed: prajñā tantram hi pūrvāt punar apara mukhāt eva yoga anuviddham savya āsyāt yoga tantram gadati jinapatiḥ vāma vaktrāt kriyā ādyam

analyzed: yoga ācāram hi pūrvāt punar apara mukhāt madhya gam vai samastam sūtrāntam savya vaktrāt gadati sita mukhāt śuddha vaibhāṣikam ca

original: ṛgvedaṃ paścimāsyādapi gadati yajurvāmavaktrājjinendraḥ savyāsyāt sāmavedaṃ paramaharikule'tharvaṇaṃ pūrvavaktrāt
analyzed: ṛgvedam paścima āsyāt api gadati yajuḥ vāma vaktrāt jinendraḥ savya āsyāt sāmavedam parama hari kule tharvaṇam pūrva vaktrāt

original: pūrvāsyāt kolatantraṃ punaraparamukhād gāruḍaṃ bhūtatantraṃ siddhāntaṃ vāmavaktrādudayaravinibhād viṣṇudhamaṃ ca savyāt || 49 ||

original: pṛṣṭhāt sadyo nivṛttiḥ paramasitamukhād vāmadevaḥ pratiṣṭhā savyād vidyā tvaghoraḥ punaranilamukhānmārutabrahmaśāntyo (ntī ? )
analyzed: pṛṣṭhāt sadyas nivṛttiḥ parama sita mukhāt vāmadevaḥ pratiṣṭhā savyāt vidyā tu aghoraḥ punar anila mukhāt māruta brahma śāntyaḥ

original: śūnyāsyāt śūnya - īśau tribhuvanapatinā sphāritā laukikārthaṃ kṛt tretā dvāparaṃ vai kaliyugamaparaṃ pṛṣṭhavaktrādibhedāt ||50||

original: yoginītantrādispharaṇa mahoddeśaḥ pūrvāt sarvāstivādaṃ gadati jinapatiḥ sāmmitīyaṃ ca savyāt pṛṣṭhāsyāt sthāvarīyaṃ punarapi ca mahāsāṃghikaṃ vāmavaktrāt
analyzed: yoginītantra ādi spharaṇa mahā uddeśaḥ pūrvāt sarvāstivādam gadati jinapatiḥ sāmmitīyam ca savyāt pṛṣṭha āsyāt sthāvarīyam punar api ca mahā sāṃghikam vāma vaktrāt

original: mānuṣyaṃ pūrvavaktrāt punaraparamukhāt sphāritāstiyaṃgā ve savyāsyād bhūtadevāḥ paramasitamukhānnāra kāścāsurāśca ||52||

original: hṛccakrāt pūrvavaktrāt spharaṇamapi bhavennābhicakrāt parāsyāt saṃbhogāt savyavaktrād bhavati ca sahajād vāmavaktrāt samantāt |
analyzed: hṛd cakrāt pūrva vaktrāt spharaṇam api bhavet nābhi cakrāt para āsyāt saṃbhogāt savya vaktrāt bhavati ca sahajāt vāma vaktrāt samantāt

original: cakrāṇāṃ vaktramadhyāt spharaṇanidhanatā yāti bhāvaḥ śarīre trailokyaṃ cāpi kṛtsnaṃ khalu jinajanakasyāsyabhedaiśca samyak || 53||
analyzed: cakrāṇām vaktra madhyāt spharaṇa nidhana tā yāti bhāvaḥ śarīre trailokyam ca api kṛtsnam khalu jina janakasya āsya bhedaiḥ ca samyak

original: śrīcandrāccandrakānte sravati hi salilaṃ nirvikalpasvabhāvāt tadvat sarvajñadharmaḥ sravati jinapateḥ skandhamāśritya loke |
analyzed: śrī candrāt candrakānte sravati hi salilam nirvikalpa svabhāvāt tadvat sarvajña dharmaḥ sravati jinapateḥ skandham āśritya loke

original: dharmastoyaṃ yathaiva vrajati samarasaṃ bījadhātvāśrayeṇa sattvānāṃ cittaśuddhayā bhavati bahuvidhaṃ pūrvakamaṃprabhāvāt || 54 ||
analyzed: dharmaḥ toyam yathā eva vrajati sama rasam bīja dhātu āśrayeṇa sattvānām citta śuddhayā bhavati bahuvidham

original: cintā sarvārthakartustribhuvananilaye nāsti cintāmaṇeśca cittasthaṃ tanna paśyantyaśubhaphalavaśāt karmaṇaḥ pāpasattvāḥ |
analyzed: cintā sarva artha kartuḥ tribhuvana nilaye nā asti cintāmaṇeḥ ca citta stham tat na paśyanti aśubha phala vaśāt karmaṇaḥ pāpa sattvāḥ

original: doṣaścintāmaṇerna hyaśubhaśubhaphalaṃ sarvasattvaḥ prabhuṅkte śuddhe sattve jinendraḥ sa ca bhavati naraḥ kiṃ jinenāpareṇa ||55||
analyzed: doṣaḥ cintāmaṇeḥ na hi aśubha śubha phalam sarva sattvaḥ prabhuṅkte śuddhe sattve jinendraḥ sa ca bhavati naraḥ kim jinena apareṇa

original: jāto yenāṅkaro'sau vrajati sa janako jātabhāvād vināśaṃ jāto naṣṭasya tasya prabhavati janako bījarājasya bhūyaḥ |
analyzed: jātaḥ sau vrajati sa janakaḥ jāta bhāvāt vināśam jātaḥ naṣṭasya tasya prabhavati janakaḥ bījarājasya bhūyas

original: yaḥ pūrvaḥ so'nyabhāvānmṛta iti vacanaṃ na svarūpeṇa jātaḥ śūnyād yenāgataḥ kṣmāṃ vrajati daśabalastena saukhyakṣaṇena || 56 ||
analyzed: yaḥ pūrvaḥ saḥ ni abhāvāt mṛtaḥ iti vacanam na sva rūpeṇa jātaḥ śūnyāt yena āgataḥ kṣmām vrajati daśabalaḥ tena saukhya kṣaṇena

original: sokhyāt saukhyānuraktaḥ kṣaṇa iha sahajo nānyabhāvānuraktaḥ skandhā ye tena jātāḥ punarapi janakāste'sya sokhyakṣaṇasya |
analyzed: sokhyāt saukhya anuraktaḥ kṣaṇaḥ iha sahajaḥ na anya bhāva anuraktaḥ skandhāḥ ye tena jātāḥ punar api janakāḥ te sokhya kṣaṇasya

original: śuddhāddharmastato'nyaḥ punarapi ca tato'nyaśca tasmādviśuddho bījānmūlāni śākhā : kusumaphalamivāropitācchuddhabhūmyām ||57||
analyzed: śuddhāt dharmaḥ tatas nyaḥ punar api ca tatas nyaḥ ca tasmāt viśuddhaḥ bījāt mūlāni śākhā kusuma phalam iva āropitāt śuddha bhūmyām

original: bhūvāryagniśca vāyū rasaparamaraso cāṇavaḥ ṣaṭ prakārā gandhādyekekahīnā viṣayavirahitāścāntimā jñānadṛśyāḥ |
analyzed: bhū vāri agniḥ ca vāyuḥ ca aṇavaḥ ṣaṭ prakārāḥ gandha ādi eka eka hīnāḥ viṣaya virahitāḥ ca antimāḥ jñāna dṛśyāḥ

original: vimalaprabhāyāṃ kāmā rūpāstvarūpā yamayamaśaśinaścāntimo dharmadhātuḥ sarvākārāḥ sadā te'cyutasukhasahajādhārabhūtāḥ samantāt ||58||
analyzed: vimala prabhāyām kāmāḥ rūpāḥ tu arūpāḥ yama yama śaśinaḥ ca antimaḥ dharmadhātuḥ sarva ākārāḥ sadā te cyuta sukha sahaja ādhāra bhūtāḥ samantāt

original: anyonyaṃ skandhabhūtā viṣaya viṣayiṇo'nyonyamārāstva vidyāḥ pañcānyonyānuraktā rasagatiṣu gatā duḥkhasokhyakṣaṇasya |
analyzed: anyonyam skandha bhūtāḥ viṣaya viṣayiṇaḥ nyonya mārāḥ tva vidyāḥ pañca anyonya anuraktāḥ rasa gatiṣu gatāḥ duḥkha sokhya kṣaṇasya

original: sarvākārāḥ samantānna paraguṇaratāḥ saṃsthitā'bhedavajrā anyonyaṃ kṣmādighāto punarapi ca gatā mukhyabhāve'nyabhāvāḥ || 59 ||
analyzed: sarva ākārāḥ samantāt na para guṇa ratāḥ saṃsthitāḥ bheda vajrāḥ anyonyam punar api ca gatāḥ mukhya bhāve

original: taiścadhiṃ kālacakraḥ prakaṭayati mahānekanirmāṇakārya- vajrajvālāsphuradbhistvasurasuranṛṇāṃ kāmadhāto sthitānām |
analyzed: taiḥ cadhim kālacakraḥ prakaṭayati mahān eka nirmāṇa kārya vajra jvālā sphuradbhiḥ tu asura sura nṛṇām kāmadhātoḥ sthitānām

original: saṃbhogai rūpiṇāṃ ve nabhasi jinasutādyarhatāṃ dharmakāryaḥ śūnyāṃśaiḥ śūnyakṛtsnaṃ tribhuvanasakalaṃ vāyubhirvāyukṛtsnam || 60||

original: tejo'śairvahnikṛtsnaṃ hyadakamapi jagatsphāritaiścodakāṃśaiḥ pṛthvīkṛtsnaṃ dharāśeḥ samuditaviṣayeḥ sarvavastusvabhāvam |
analyzed: vahni kṛtsnam hi adakam api jagat sphāritaiḥ ca udaka aṃśaiḥ pṛthvī kṛtsnam sarva vastu svabhāvam

original: ekātmānaṃ samantād gaganasamamidaṃ darśayecchuddhabhūmyā- mevaṃ buddhasya kāyo bhavati na mriyate'pyeka saukhyasvabhāvāt || 61 ||
analyzed: eka ātmānam samantāt gagana samam idam darśayet śuddhabhūmyām m evam buddhasya kāyaḥ bhavati na mriyate saukhya svabhāvāt

original: pañcākārāt tadekāt sakalajinavaraiścābhisambodhireṣā viṃśatyākārarūpā punarapi ca tato'nekamāyāsvarūpā |
analyzed: pañca ākārāt tad ekāt sakala jinavaraiḥ ca abhisambodhiḥ eṣā viṃśati ākāra rūpā punar api ca tatas neka māyā svarūpā

original: tasyā ekakṣaṇā syāt samasukhaphaladā nānyakarmasvabhāvā atropāyo'cyuto yaḥ kṣaṇa iha sahajo dharmadhātupraveśe || 62 ||
analyzed: tasyāḥ eka kṣaṇā syāt sama sukha phala dā na anya karma svabhāvā cyutaḥ yaḥ kṣaṇaḥ iha sahajaḥ dharmadhātu praveśe

original: buddhakṣetrāṇyanantānyaparimitaguṇā dhātavaścāmbarādyāḥ sthityutpattī vināśastrividha iti bhavaḥ ṣaḍgatau sarvasattvāḥ |
analyzed: buddhakṣetrāṇi anantāni aparimita guṇāḥ dhātavaḥ ca ambara ādyāḥ sthiti utpattī vināśaḥ trividhaḥ iti bhavaḥ ṣaṣ gatau sarva sattvāḥ

original: buddhāḥ krodhāḥ surādyāḥ sakaruṇahṛdayā bodhisattvāḥ sabhāryā etaccakraṃ jinasya tribhuvananamitasyaikamekasya śambhoḥ || 63 ||
analyzed: buddhāḥ krodhāḥ sura ādyāḥ sa karuṇa hṛdayāḥ bodhisattvāḥ sa bhāryāḥ etat cakram jinasya tribhuvana namitasya ekam ekasya śambhoḥ

original: 'ato'ṣṭacatvāriṃśadvṛttamārabhya trayaṣṣaṣṭimaṃ vṛttaṃ yāvat ṣoḍaśaṃ vṛttāni subodhāni || 48-63 ||
analyzed: ṣṭacatvāriṃśat vṛttam ārabhya trayaṣṣaṣṭimam vṛttam yāvat ṣoḍaśam vṛttāni su bodhāni

original: yoginī tantrādispharaṇa mahoddeśaḥ idānīṃ śarīre daśākāraśuddhirucyate- lomatvagraktamāṃsaṃ sarasamapi tathāsthīni majjā ca nāḍya- stāsu prāṇādivātā raviśaśigamanaṃ vāyumadhye samantāt |
analyzed: yoginī tantra ādi spharaṇa mahā uddeśaḥ idānīm śarīre daśa ākāra śuddhiḥ ucyate loma tvac rakta māṃsam sa rasam api tathā asthīni majjā ca nāḍyaḥ tāsu prāṇa ādi vātāḥ ravi

original: vijñānaṃ candramadhye vimalamaṇirivāliṅgitaṃ sarvabhāve- rbhāvābhāvādvayatvaṃ paramamṛtapadaṃ vyāpakānāhataṃ tat ||64||
analyzed: vijñānam candra madhye vimala maṇiḥ iva āliṅgitam sarva bhāveḥ bhāva abhāva advaya tvam param amṛta padam vyāpaka anāhatam tat
tat

original: lometyādi |
analyzed: loma ityādi

original: iha loma keśa ākāśadhātuḥ, tvag māṃsaṃ vāyudhātuḥ, raktaṃ dvidhā tejo- dhātuḥ, svedaṃ mūtraṃ toyadhātu:, asthi majjā pṛthvīdhātuḥ, nāṭyaḥ prāṇādayo jñānadhātuḥ |
analyzed: iha loma keśaḥ ākāśa dhātuḥ tvac māṃsam vāyu dhātuḥ raktam dvidhā tejaḥ dhātuḥ svedam mūtram toya dhātu asthi majjā pṛthvī dhātuḥ nāṭyaḥ prāṇa ādayaḥ jñāna dhātuḥ

original: rāhupucchaṃ jñānavajram, rāhuścittavajram, ravirvāgvajram, candraḥ kāyavantram |
analyzed: rāhupuccham jñāna vajram rāhuḥ citta vajram raviḥ vāc vajram candraḥ kāya vantram

analyzed: eṣām caturṇām prāṇa madhye gamanam samantāt

analyzed: vijñānam candra madhye śukra madhye vimala maṇiḥ iva sphaṭikaḥ iva māliṅgitam sarva bhāvaiḥ upadhā yogataḥ

original: bhāvābhāvayoradvayatvaṃ māyopamaṃ śūnyatābimbamatrākṣara- sukhaṃ paramamṛtapadaṃ vyāpakānāhataṃ taditi niyamaḥ |
analyzed: bhāva abhāvayoḥ advaya tvam māyā upamam śūnyatā bimbam atra akṣara sukham param amṛta padam vyāpaka anāhatam tat iti niyamaḥ

original: śarīre daśākāraśuddhiḥ || 64 ||
analyzed: śarīre daśa ākāra śuddhiḥ

original: idānīṃ daśabhūmibhiste dhātavaḥ śodhyante- lomādyāścandramo'ntāḥ sakalatanugatā bhūmayo yā daśoktāḥ ṣaḍvargā lādayo'nyāḥ samasukhaphaladā yogināṃ sarvakālam |
analyzed: idānīm daśa bhūmibhiḥ te dhātavaḥ śodhyante loma ādyāḥ candramaḥ ntāḥ sakala tanu gatāḥ bhūmayaḥ yāḥ daśa uktāḥ ṣaṣ vargāḥ la ādayaḥ nyāḥ sama sukha phala dāḥ yoginām sarvakālam

original: tasmādanveṣaṇīyā gurucaraṇagatairyogibhirmokṣaheto- rnānyo buddho'sti kaścitvapi tanuvirahād vyāpako mokṣado yaḥ || 65 ||
analyzed: tasmāt anveṣaṇīyāḥ guru caraṇa gataiḥ yogibhiḥ mokṣa hetoḥ rna anyaḥ sti kaścid tu api tanu virahāt vyāpakaḥ mokṣa daḥ yaḥ

original: lomādyā iti |
analyzed: loma ādyāḥ iti

original: iha loma keśāḥ pramuditā, carma māṃsaṃ vimalā, raktaṃ dviṣā prabhākarī, rasasalilamaciṣmatī, asthi majjā sudurjayā, nāḍī prāṇo'bhimukhī, kālāgnī rāgadhāturdūraṅgamā, rāhuracalā, raviḥ sādhumatī, candro dharmameghā, rāgata (sta)- morajaḥ sarakhadharmeṇa saṃvṛtyāvatāraḥ |
analyzed: iha loma keśāḥ pramuditā carma māṃsam vimalā raktam dviṣā prabhākarī rasa salilam aciṣmatī asthi majjā su durjayā nāḍī prāṇaḥ abhimukhī kālāgniḥ rāgadhātuḥ dūraṅgamā rāhuḥ

original: evaṃ lomādyāścandramohantāḥ sakalatanugatā nirā- varaṇagatāḥ|
analyzed: evam loma ādyāḥ candramaḥ hantāḥ sakala tanu gatāḥ nirāḥ varaṇa gatāḥ

original: teṣāṃ daśabhūmayastā daśoktā yā bhūmayaḥ, tāḥ punaḥ ṣaḍvargā lāvayo nyāsamātrikā uktāḥ |
analyzed: teṣām daśa bhūmayaḥ tāḥ daśa uktāḥ yāḥ bhūmayaḥ tāḥ punar ṣaṣ vargāḥ lāvayaḥ nyāsa mātrikāḥ uktāḥ

original: tatra kavargaḥ pramuditā |
analyzed: tatra kavargaḥ pramuditā

original: evaṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ ca ṭa pa ta sa iti ṣaḍvargāḥ, la va ra ya ha al o ar e a la u ṛ i a ha: amiti |
evaṃ vilomenāpi dīrghādi- vargāḥ prajñābhūmayaḥ |
analyzed: evam vilomena api dīrgha ādi vargāḥ prajñābhūmayaḥ

original: amī samasukhaphaladā yogināṃ sarvakālam |
analyzed: amī sama sukha phala dāḥ yoginām sarvakālam

original: tasmādanveṣaṇīyā guru- caraṇagatairavadhūtīcā ragatairyogibhirmokṣahetoriti bhagavato niyamaḥ |
analyzed: tasmāt anveṣaṇīyā guru caraṇa gataiḥ avadhūtī cāra gataiḥ yogibhiḥ mokṣa hetoḥ iti bhagavataḥ niyamaḥ

original: nānyo buddho'sti kaścidapi tanuvirahād vyāpako mokṣado ya iti |
analyzed: na anyaḥ buddhaḥ sti kaścid api tanu virahāt vyāpakaḥ mokṣa daḥ yaḥ iti

original: iha śarīradhātavo nirāvaraṇā buddhatva- dāyakā mokṣadāśceti || 65 ||
analyzed: iha śarīra dhātavaḥ nirāvaraṇāḥ dāyakāḥ mokṣa dāḥ ca iti

original: sattvā buddhā na buddhastvapara iha mahān vidyate lokadhātau tvaparimitabhavaśchidyate teṣāmārādhanena ca. traidhātavaḥ |
analyzed: sattvāḥ buddhāḥ na buddhaḥ tu aparaḥ iha mahān vidyate lokadhātau tu aparimita bhavaḥ chidyate teṣām ārādhanena ca traidhātavaḥ

original: nirvikalpāt |
analyzed: nirvikalpāt

original: vimalaprabhāyāṃ [ jñāna- drohaṃ kurvan hi yogī vrajati hi narakaṃ rauravādyaṃ mahāntaṃ tasmāccitte viśuddhe'pyabudhabudhajanānāṃ viruddhaṃ na kuryāt ||66||
analyzed: vimalaprabhāyām droham kurvan hi yogī vrajati hi narakam raurava ādyam mahāntam tasmāt citte viśuddhe pi abudha budha janānām viruddham na kuryāt

original: labdhvā sattvaprasaṅgaṃ bhavati narapate yadvā saṃsāriṇāṃ syādakuśala guṇināṃ śuddhametryādicittaṃ dveṣarāgādicittam |
analyzed: labdhvā sattva prasaṅgam bhavati narapate yat vā saṃsāriṇām syāt akuśala guṇinām śuddha metrī ādi cittam dveṣa rāga ādi cittam

original: gacchantaṃ gantukāmaṃ dvividhamapi bhavet sarvadā bodhicittaṃ mokṣa prasthānahīnaṃ praṇidhivirahitaṃ sarvadā māracittam || 67||
analyzed: gacchantam gantu kāmam dvividham api bhavet sarvadā bodhi cittam mokṣa prasthāna hīnam praṇidhi virahitam sarvadā māra cittam

original: mārāḥ kurvantyaśānti tribhuvananilaye bodhisattvāśca śānti mārendraścaddhihīnaḥ paramabhayakaraścaddhimānekaśāstā |
analyzed: mārāḥ kurvanti aśānti tribhuvana nilaye bodhisattvāḥ ca śānti māra indraḥ caddhi hīnaḥ parama bhaya karaḥ caddhimān eka śāstā

original: mārāṇāṃ mārabuddhiḥ parahṛdayagatā tāyināṃ saukhyabuddhi- stasmād buddhānubhāvaistribhuvanasakalaṃ vartate'nantakālam || 68 ||
analyzed: mārāṇām māra buddhiḥ para hṛdaya gatā tāyinām saukhya buddhiḥ stasmāt buddha anubhāvaiḥ tribhuvana sakalam vartate nanta kālam

original: yanmānaṃ lokadhātoḥ kathitamapi jinestannṛṇāṃ jānatāṃ na
analyzed: yat mānam lokadhātoḥ kathitam api jineḥ tat nṛṇām jānatām na

original: buddhānāṃ nāsti mānaṃ sahajatanuvaśādekahastaṃ hyanekam
analyzed: buddhānām nā asti mānam sahaja tanu vaśāt eka hastam hi anekam

original: mānaṃ sattvānurūpaṃ prakaṭayati sadā prāṇināṃ karmabhūmā- vicchāmānaṃ tvidaṃ me yadi vadati surā nāstiko'yaṃ vadanti || 69 ||
analyzed: mānam sattva anurūpam prakaṭayati sadā prāṇinām karma bhūmā vicchā mānam tu idam me yadi vadati surāḥ nāstikaḥ yam vadanti

original: yenotpannā jinendrāḥ pratidivasavaśānnirgatā yena garbhāt siddhā yena kṣaṇena kṣaraṇavirahitā spandaniḥspandabhūtāḥ
analyzed: yena utpannāḥ jinendrāḥ prati divasa vaśāt nirgatāḥ yena garbhāt siddhāḥ yena kṣaṇena kṣaraṇa virahitā spanda niḥspanda bhūtāḥ

original: tyaktvā tad buddhakṛtyaṃ samasukharahitaṃ bhāvayed yo'nyaśūnyaṃ buddhatvaṃ tasya dūraṃ sahajamapi sukhaṃ koṭikalpairanekaiḥ || 70 ||
analyzed: tyaktvā tat buddha kṛtyam sama sukha rahitam bhāvayet yaḥ buddhatvam tasya dūram sahajam api sukham koṭi kalpaiḥ anekaiḥ

original: na drākṣā nimbavṛkṣādamṛtamapi viṣāt paṅkajaṃ brahmavṛkṣāt śūnyānnirvāṇa saukhyaṃ śubhamaśubhavaśāt siddhayaḥ prāṇighātāt
analyzed: na drākṣā nimba vṛkṣāt amṛtam api viṣāt paṅkajam brahmavṛkṣāt śūnyāt nirvāṇa saukhyam śubham aśubha vaśāt siddhayaḥ prāṇi ghātāt

original: yajñāt svargaḥ paśūnāṃ paramaśivapadaṃ nendriyāṇāṃ nirodhād vedāt sarvajñabhāṣā'kṣarasukhamacalaṃ na kṣarāśuddhacittāt ||71||
analyzed: yajñāt svargaḥ paśūnām paramaśiva padam na indriyāṇām nirodhāt vedāt sarvajña bhāṣā kṣara sukham acalam na kṣara aśuddha cittāt

original: sattvānāṃ pāpacittaṃ bhavati narapate'dhiṣṭhitaṃ mārakāyaiḥ puṇyajñānānuraktaṃ sukhadamapi sadādhiṣṭhitaṃ bodhisattvaḥ
analyzed: sattvānām pāpa cittam bhavati narapate dhiṣṭhitam māra kāyaiḥ puṇya jñāna anuraktam sukha dam api sadā adhiṣṭhitam bodhisattvaḥ

original: nirvāṇaṃ yānti yasmāt sukhasamayavaśāt kleśamārānnihatya tasmāt kurvanti mārāḥ pratidinasamaye'neka vighnāni teṣām ||72||
analyzed: nirvāṇam yānti yasmāt sukha samaya vaśāt kleśa mārān nihatya tasmāt kurvanti mārāḥ prati dina samaye vighnāni teṣām

original: sevyā''do karmamudrā jinasahajasukhasyāsya vṛddhayarthaheto- tanumukhacaraṇoṣṇīṣasarvāṅgapūrṇā
analyzed: sevyā karma mudrā jina sahaja sukhasya asya vṛddhaya artha heto tanu mukha caraṇa uṣṇīṣa sarva aṅga pūrṇā

original: lakṣaṇāṅgaprapūrṇā paṭale, 66-76 ilo. ] yoginī tantrādispharaṇa mahoddeśaḥ stasmādādityarūpā vidyuddaṇḍānurūpā'cyutasukha jananī vajrarudbhāsayantī tribhava gatatanurdharmadhātustataḥ sarvasmin sarvakālaṃ syāt ||73||
analyzed: lakṣaṇa aṅga prapūrṇā paṭale yoginī tantra ādi spharaṇa mahā uddeśaḥ mahā uddeśaḥ mahā uddeśaḥ mahā uddeśaḥ jananī vajrarut bhāsayantī tri bhava gata tanuḥ dharmadhātuḥ tatas sarvasmin

original: etā mudrāścatasro'kṣarasukhaphaladā yoginā bhāvanīyā: surataratigaterloka māgaṃ prayukteḥ
analyzed: etāḥ mudrāḥ catasraḥ kṣara sukha phala dāḥ yoginā bhāvanīyā prayukteḥ

original: grāmāraṇyaśmaśāne'śuciśucinilaye veśmadevālaye ca varṇāvarṇābhicāraistanubalasukhaderannapānādibhogeḥ ataḥ pañcaṣaṣṭivṛttādaparāṇi nava vṛttāni subodhāni catuḥsaptati- paryantamiti || 66-74 ||
analyzed: grāma araṇya śmaśāne śuci śuci nilaye veśma devālaye ca varṇa avarṇa abhicāraiḥ tanu bala sukha deḥ anna pāna ādi bhogeḥ atas pañcaṣaṣṭi vṛttāt aparāṇi nava vṛttāni su bodhāni

original: idānīṃ śūnyatābimbe dṛṣṭe sati prāṇanirodhena yogināṃ kṣaṇalābha ucyate- vātaiḥ saṃghaṭṭamānaistaḍidanalaśikhā drāvayed mūrdhni candra yo yo bindudruto'smād galahṛdayagato nābhiguhye niruddhaḥ
analyzed: idānīm śūnyatā bimbe dṛṣṭe sati prāṇa nirodhena yoginām kṣaṇa lābhaḥ ucyate vātaiḥ saṃghaṭṭamānaiḥ taḍit anala śikhāḥ drāvayet mūrdhni candra yaḥ yaḥ bindu drutaḥ smāt

original: bindoḥ spandadravaṃ yat kuliśamaṇigataṃ sanniruddhaṃ dhvajāgre prajñājñānakṣaṇaṃ tad yadi dadati sukhaṃ bindumālācyutena || 75 ||
analyzed: bindoḥ spanda dravam yat kuliśa maṇi gatam sat niruddham dhvaja agre prajñā jñāna kṣaṇam tat yadi dadati sukham bindu mālā cyutena

original: vātairityādi
analyzed: vātaiḥ ityādi

original: prāṇāyāmena daśavātānāṃ saṃghaṭṭanaṃ bhavati
analyzed: prāṇāyāmena daśa vātānām saṃghaṭṭanam bhavati

original: prāmbimbe dṛṣṭe sati taiḥ prāṇāpānādibhirdaśabhiḥ saṃghaṭṭamānairnābhikaṇikāyāṃ caṇḍālī taḍidanalastasya śikhā raśmiḥ, sā śikhā mūni lalāṭe drāvayeccandramiti bodhicittaṃ janmasthānīyam
analyzed: prāmbimbe dṛṣṭe sati taiḥ prāṇa apāna ādibhiḥ daśabhiḥ saṃghaṭṭamānaiḥ nābhi kaṇikāyām caṇḍālī taḍit analaḥ tasya śikhā raśmiḥ sā śikhā lalāṭe drāvayet candram iti bodhi

original: yo yo bodhicittavindudruto'smād lalāṭād gale hṛdaye nābhau guhye gato niruddho bhavati, prāṇāpānabalena kāryābindurguhye niruddhaḥ, evaṃ vākcittajñānabindurnābho hṛdaye kaṇṭhe niruddhaḥ, asmād bindoḥ spanvadravaṃ yaditi
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ bodhi citta vindu drutaḥ smāt lalāṭāt gale hṛdaye nābhau guhye gataḥ niruddhaḥ bhavati prāṇa apāna balena kāryā abinduḥ guhye niruddhaḥ evam vāc citta jñāna binduḥ nābhaḥ

original: iha guhyagatasya kāryābindorhyavaruddhasya yadaparaṃ svacchadravaṃ spandadravaṃ taducyate
analyzed: iha guhya gatasya kārya a bindoḥ hi avaruddhasya yat aparam svaccha dravam spanda dravam tat ucyate

original: tatra kuliśa maṇigataṃ sanniruddhaṃ dhvajāgre liṅgamukhe
analyzed: tatra kuliśa maṇi gatam san niruddham dhvaja agre liṅga mukhe

original: prajñājñānakṣaṇaṃ spandaṃ tad yadi vadati sukhaṃ bindumālācyutena hetunā, tadā na karmamudrājñānam
analyzed: prajñā jñāna kṣaṇam spandam tat yadi vadati sukham bindu mālā cyutena hetunā tadā na karma mudrā jñānam

original: prajñājñānamiti siddham || 75 ||
analyzed: prajñā jñānam iti siddham

original: tasmānniḥspandasaukhyakṣaṇamiha sahajaṃ dharmadhāturdadāti prāṇenākṛṣya sarvān rasagatiṣu gatān kleśamārānnihatya
analyzed: tasmāt niḥspanda saukhya kṣaṇam iha sahajam dharmadhātuḥ dadāti prāṇena ākṛṣya sarvān rasa gatiṣu gatān kleśa mārān nihatya

original: ṛddhi sarvajñabhūmi tribhuvanagurutāṃ yogināṃ janmanīha mṛtyuṃ mārgapraviṣṭo vrajati yadi tadā tadgrahādanyajātyā || 76 ||
analyzed: ṛddhi sarvajña bhūmi tribhuvana gurutām yoginām janmani iha mṛtyum mārga praviṣṭaḥ vrajati yadi tadā tad grahāt anya jātyā

original: tasmādacyutāddhetoryaniṣpanvasaukhyakṣaṇamiha dharmadhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā dadāti
analyzed: tasmāt acyutāt hetoḥ yad niṣpanu asaukhya kṣaṇam iha dharmadhātuḥ prajñāpāramitā dadāti

original: tena mahāmudrāsukhaṃ paramākṣaraṃ karmajñānamudrāsukhaṃ spandamupāyasukhaṃ kṣaraṃ spandaṃ bālaṃ prauḍhaṃ ceti
analyzed: tena mahāmudrā sukham paramākṣaram karma jñāna mudrā sukham spandam upāya sukham kṣaram spandam bālam prauḍham ca iti

original: yathā raso bālo yuvā vṛddho baddhaśceti, evaṃ śukramapi bālaṃ prauḍhaṃ vṛddhaṃ niruddhaṃ sarvāvaraṇakṣayataḥ
analyzed: yathā rasaḥ bālaḥ yuvā vṛddhaḥ baddhaḥ ca iti evam śukram api bālam prauḍham vṛddham niruddham sarva āvaraṇa kṣayataḥ

original: āvaraṇaṃ mala iti
analyzed: āvaraṇam malaḥ iti

original: tadeva bodhicittamūrdhvaṃ yadā yāti lalāṭe tadā yathāgataṃ tathāgataṃ bhavati
analyzed: tat eva bodhi cittam ūrdhvam yadā yāti lalāṭe tadā yathāgatam tathāgatam bhavati

original: taccittaṃ prāṇenākṛṣya sarvān dvayayutadvayaṣṭaśatān rasagatiṣu gatān pṛthivyādiṣaṇmaṇḍalagatān
analyzed: tat cittam prāṇena ākṛṣya sarvān dvaya yuta dvaya ṣaṣ śatān rasa gatiṣu gatān pṛthivī ādi ṣaṣ maṇḍala gatān

original: evaṃ kleśamārānnihatya ṛddhīḥ sarvajñasya dvādaśa bhūmorvakṣyamāṇāḥ, tribhuvanagurutāmiti sarvajñatā sarvākārajñatā mārgajñatā-mārgā- kārajñatādivibhūtīrdadāti yogināṃ janmanīha vīryavatām
analyzed: evam kleśa mārān nihatya ṛddhīḥ sarvajñasya dvādaśa bhūmoḥ vakṣyamāṇāḥ tribhuvana gurutām iti sarvajña tā sarva ākāra jña tā mārga jña tā mārga ākāra jña tā ādi vibhūtīḥ dadāti

original: ataḥ prāptayogo yadā mṛtyuṃ yāti māgaṃpraviṣṭaḥ san tadā tadgraheṇa vāsanābalena punarmanuṣyajātyā anyayā sarva prāpnoti, saptajanmaparyantenāvīryavānapi san jñānamabhāvayanniti niyamaḥ || 76 ||
analyzed: atas prāpta yogaḥ yadā mṛtyum yāti san tadā tad graheṇa vāsanā balena punar manuṣya jātyā anyayā sarva prāpnoti sapta janma paryantena avīryavān api san jñānam abhāvayan iti niyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ bodhisatvādhiṣṭhānotpāda ucyate- yā nairguṇyālpabhāvā viṣayavirahitā kāyamudrā dvidhā sā tasyā rāgānuraktā guṇanidhiraparā vāksvarūpā dvidhā ca
analyzed: idānīm bodhisatva adhiṣṭhāna utpādaḥ ucyate yā nairguṇya alpa bhāvā viṣaya virahitā kāyamudrā dvidhā sā tasyāḥ rāga anuraktā guṇa nidhiḥ aparā vāc svarūpā dvidhā ca

original: kṛṣṇā śvetā'nuraktā viṣayaguṇaratā cittamudrā dvidhā syād aṣṭo dvo pañca pañca sphuṭamapi khayugaṃ śūnyavedaṃ ca varṣam ||77||
analyzed: kṛṣṇā śvetā nuraktā viṣaya guṇa ratā cittamudrā dvidhā syāt pañca pañca sphuṭam api kha yugam śūnya vedam ca varṣam

original: yā nairguṇyetyādi
analyzed: yā nairguṇya ityādi

original: iha yā kumārī nairguṇyā dharmadhātuguṇarahitā'cyavanāt, sā'lpabhāvā kāyadhātva pūrṇā'patitadantā ekā aṣṭavarṣāvidhiḥ
analyzed: iha yā kumārī nairguṇyā dharmadhātu guṇa rahitā cyavanāt sā lpa bhāvā pūrṇā patita dantā ekā aṣṭa varṣā vidhiḥ

original: tato dvitīyā patitadantā daśavarṣāvadhikā
analyzed: tatas dvitīyā patita dantā daśa varṣau adhikā

original: evaṃ kāyamudrā akṣatayoniḥ
analyzed: evam kāyamudrā akṣatayoniḥ

original: tadavadherekādaśavarṣamārabhya pañcadaśavarṣaṃ yāvad ekā rāgānuraktā, guṇanidhiraparā'parapañcavarṣāṇi yāvad vāṅmudrā dvidhā syāt
analyzed: tad avadheḥ ekādaśa varṣam ārabhya pañcadaśa varṣam yāvat ekā rāga anuraktā guṇa nidhiḥ aparā para pañca varṣāṇi yāvat vāṅmudrā dvidhā syāt

original: evamaṣṭo varṣāṇi dvau saṃvatsarau, tataḥ pañca pañca vatsarāḥ
analyzed: evam aṣṭa varṣāṇi dvau saṃvatsarau tatas pañca pañca vatsarāḥ

original: tato viśadvarṣādūrdhvamaparaṃ khaghugamiti catvāriṃśadvarṣāṇi
analyzed: tatas viśat varṣāt ūrdhvam aparam khaghugam iti catvāriṃśat varṣāṇi

original: evaṃ cittamudrā ekā kṛṣṇabhāvānuraktā
analyzed: evam citta mudrā ekā kṛṣṇa bhāva anuraktā

original: evaṃ ṣaṣṭivārṣika strī
analyzed: evam ṣaṣṭi vārṣika strī

original: punaraparā śūnyavedamiti catvāriṃśad varṣaṃ yāvat śvetabhāvā- nuraktā vṛddhā jarāpalitavatī varṣaśataparyantam
analyzed: punar aparā śūnyavedam iti catvāriṃśat varṣam yāvat śveta bhāvā nuraktā vṛddhā jarā palitavatī varṣa śata paryantam

original: evaṃ cittamudrāpi dviṣeti
analyzed: evam citta mudrā api dviṣā iti

original: āsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ madhye kāyamudrātibālā, vāṅmudrātiproḍhā, cittamudrātivṛddhā
analyzed: āsām tisṛṇām madhye kāya mudrā atibālā vāc mudrā ati proḍhā citta mudrā ati vṛddhā

original: etāstisro varjayitvā ekādaśavārṣikā sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpūrṇā rakṣaṇīyā rājaguruṇā rājñā vā abhiṣiktena, anyairvā īśvarairabhiṣiktaiḥ || 77 ||
analyzed: etāḥ tisraḥ varjayitvā ekādaśa vārṣikā sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpūrṇā rakṣaṇīyā rāja guruṇā rājñā vā abhiṣiktena anyaiḥ vā īśvaraiḥ abhiṣiktaiḥ

original: ratneśo yāvada-syājjinavarajananī yogibhī rakṣaṇīyā ratneśodbhūtakāle sakalaguṇanidhi maṇḍalaṃ vartayitvā
analyzed: ratneśaḥ syāt jinavara jananī yogibhiḥ rakṣaṇīyā ratneśa udbhūta kāle sakala guṇa nidhi maṇḍalam vartayitvā

original: yoginītantrādispharaṇa mahoddeśaḥ buddhādhiṣṭhānamantreḥ sṛjati samasukhaṃ guhyapadma samantraṃ guhye rakṣāṃ prakṛtya kuliśamaṇigataṃ svādayed bodhicittam ||78||
analyzed: yoginītantra ādi spharaṇa mahā uddeśaḥ sṛjati sama sukham guhya padma sa mantram guhye rakṣām prakṛtya kuliśamaṇi gatam svādayet bodhi cittam

original: ratneśo yāvada- syāt
analyzed: ratna īśaḥ yāvat a syāt

original: asyāditi na bhavati rajo yāvad rakṣaṇīyā
analyzed: na bhavati rajaḥ yāvat rakṣaṇīyā

original: ratneśo- dabhūtakāle sakalaguṇanidhi maṇḍalaṃ vartayitvā kālacakram, pūrvaṃ suśikṣitāṃ kṛtvā tatra tāmabhiṣicya buddhādhiṣṭhānamantraiḥ ṣaḍvacairmañjuśrīsamādhinā tāmapi prajñāṃ niṣpādya sṛjati samasukhaṃ dakṣiṇanāḍīpravāhakāle bodhicittam, tasyā: guhyapadme samantraṃ kāyavā cittajñānamantrasahitaṃ sphārayet
analyzed: ratneśaḥ sakala guṇa nidhi maṇḍalam vartayitvā kālacakram pūrvam su śikṣitām kṛtvā tatra tām abhiṣicya buddha adhiṣṭhāna mantraiḥ ṣaḍvacaiḥ mañjuśrī samādhinā tām api prajñām niṣpādya

original: tatastasyā guhye rakṣāṃ prakṛtya ṣaḍaṅgaistataḥ svakuliśamaṇigataṃ bodhicittamāsvādayet
analyzed: tatas tasyāḥ guhye rakṣām prakṛtya ṣaḍaṅgaiḥ tatas sva kuliśa maṇi gatam bodhi cittam āsvādayet

original: taṃ yogī tasyā api dadāti
analyzed: tam yogī tasyai api dadāti

original: tasyāḥ padmatrāhyaṃ yattadanāmikāṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ gṛhītvā āsvādayet sarvarakṣārthamiti, anena vidhinā || 78 ||
analyzed: tasyāḥ padma trāhyam yat tat anāmikā aṅguṣṭhābhyām gṛhītvā āsvādayet sarva rakṣā artham iti anena vidhinā

original: tasmin putro bhaved yo jinajanakasuto majuvajraḥ sa eva prajñādhikyāt kadācit prabhavati duhitā buddhamātā dhruvaṃ syāt
analyzed: tasmin putraḥ bhavet yaḥ jina janaka sutaḥ majuvajraḥ saḥ eva prajñā ādhikyāt kadācid prabhavati duhitā buddha mātā dhruvam syāt

original: tasmādanyestripuṣpaiḥ sitakamaladharo jambhalo vajrapāṇi- ranye'ṣṭāvaṣṭapuṣpaidiśi vidiśigatā maharddhikāḥ kodharājāḥ || 79 ||
analyzed: tasmāt anyeḥ tripuṣpaiḥ sitakamaladharaḥ jambhalaḥ vajrapāṇiḥ ṣṭau aṣṭa puṣpaiḥ diśi vidiśi gatāḥ maharddhikāḥ kodha rājāḥ

original: tasminnādhāne ya: putro bhavati mañjuvajñaḥ sa eva prajñādhikyāditi raja ādhikyāda yadi duhitā bhavati, tadā viśvamātādhiṣṭhānaṃ bhavati
analyzed: tasmin ādhāne putraḥ bhavati saḥ eva prajñā ādhikyāt iti yadi duhitā bhavati tadā viśva mātā adhiṣṭhānam bhavati

original: tena buddhamātā dhruvaṃ
analyzed: tena buddha mātā dhruvam

original: seti mañjuśrī viśvamātā'dhiṣṭhānavidhiḥ
analyzed: sā iti mañjuśrī viśvamātā adhiṣṭhāna vidhiḥ

original: tasmādanyaistripuṣpairiti
analyzed: tasmāt anyaiḥ tripuṣpaiḥ iti

original: iha yadi prathamarajasi garbho na jātaḥ, tadā punaḥ punaḥ pratyekarajodarśanena maṇḍalaṃ vartayitvā'parasamādhibhi- bodhicittamutsṛjediti
analyzed: iha yadi prathama rajasi garbhaḥ na jātaḥ tadā punar punar pratyeka rajaḥ darśanena maṇḍalam vartayitvā para samādhibhiḥ bodhi cittam utsṛjet iti

original: evaṃ dvitīye sitakamalaghara iti lokeśvaranirmāṇaṃ bhavati
analyzed: evam dvitīye sita kamala gharaḥ iti lokeśvara nirmāṇam bhavati

original: tṛtīye jambhalanirmāṇam, caturthe 'vajrapāṇiḥ putraviṣaye
analyzed: tṛtīye jambhala nirmāṇam caturthe vajrapāṇiḥ putra viṣaye

original: duhitāviṣaye pāṇḍarāvasudhārā- śabdavatrādhiṣṭhānaṃ bhavati
analyzed: duhitā viṣaye pāṇḍarā vasudhārā bhavati

original: tato'nye 'ṣṭāvaṣṭapuṣpaidiśiviviśigatā mahaddhikāḥ krodharājā iti
analyzed: tatas nye ṣṭau aṣṭa puṣpaiḥ diśi vi viśi gatāḥ mahaddhikāḥ krodha rājāḥ iti

original: iha pūrva jambhalādhiṣṭhāne uṣṇīṣasamādhinoṣṇīṣādhiṣṭhānaṃ bhavati
analyzed: iha jambhala adhiṣṭhāne uṣṇīṣa samādhinā uṣṇīṣa adhiṣṭhānam bhavati

original: atinīlāyā vāgvajrapāṇisthāne śumbharājo vā raudrākṣī vā bhavati
analyzed: atinīlāyāḥ vāc vajrapāṇi sthāne śumbha rājaḥ vā raudrākṣī vā bhavati

original: tataḥ pañcame rajasi vighnānta- ko'nantavīryā, ṣaṣṭhe prajñāntako jambho, saptame padmāntako māninī, aṣṭame yamāntakaḥ stambhīti
analyzed: tatas pañcame rajasi nantavīryā ṣaṣṭhe prajñā antakaḥ saptame padmāntakaḥ māninī aṣṭame yama antakaḥ stambhī iti

original: tato navame mahābalo māre (rī)cī, daśame'calaścundā, ekādaśe ṭakkirbhṛkuṭī, dvādaśe nīladaṇḍo vajraśṛṅkhaleti vidikṣu
analyzed: tatas navame mahābalaḥ māre rī cī daśame calaḥ cundā ekādaśe ṭakkiḥ bhṛkuṭī dvādaśe nīladaṇḍaḥ vajraśṛṅkhalā iti vidikṣu

original: evaṃ krodhasamādhinā krodhādhiṣṭhānaṃ bhavati garbhasye ti
analyzed: evam krodha samādhinā krodha adhiṣṭhānam bhavati garbhasya iti

original: tatastrayodaśamo rajaḥ punaḥ prathamo yathā avidyā- dyaṅgam || 79 ||
analyzed: tatas trayodaśamaḥ rajaḥ punar prathamaḥ yathā avidyā di aṅgam

original: tasmin māse rajo yat prabhavati hi punamaṃjughoṣodbhavaṃ tad viśadvarṣāṇi yāvat pratirajasi mahāsāttviko bodhisattvaḥ
analyzed: tasmin māse rajaḥ yat prabhavati hi tat viśat varṣāṇi yāvat pratirajasi mahāsāttvikaḥ bodhisattvaḥ

original: kiñcit sattvāṃśahīnaḥ prabhavati ca tataḥ śūnyavedāni yāvad viśadvarṣāṇi yāvat punarapi ca tataścānyasattvo'lpavīryaḥ || 80 ||
analyzed: kiñcid sattva aṃśa hīnaḥ prabhavati ca tatas śūnya vedāni yāvat viśat varṣāṇi yāvat punar api ca tatas ca anya sattvaḥ lpa vīryaḥ

original: tena tasmin māse rajo yat prabhavati hi punarmañjughoṣodbhavaṃ tadrajaḥ
analyzed: tena tasmin māse rajaḥ yat prabhavati hi punar mañjughoṣa udbhavam tat rajaḥ

original: evaṃ tadupari yaṃ samādhimālambayitvā yogī bodhicittaṃ visarjayet, tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ garbhasya bhavati viṃśadvarṣāṇi yāvat pratirajasi yadā bodhisattvo bhavati, eko vā ho vā ityādi, mātumahāsāsviko bhavati
analyzed: evam tad upari yam samādhim ālambayitvā yogī bodhi cittam visarjayet tat adhiṣṭhānam garbhasya bhavati viṃśat varṣāṇi yāvat pratirajasi yadā bodhisattvaḥ bhavati ekaḥ vā ho vā ityādi

original: kiñcit satvāṃśahīno bhavati catvāriṃśadvarṣāṇi yāva- nmātuviśativarṣāṇi yāvat
analyzed: kiñcid satva aṃśa hīnaḥ bhavati catvāriṃśat varṣāṇi yāvat mātu viśati varṣāṇi yāvat

original: punarapi ca tataścānyasa svo'lpavīryaḥ
analyzed: punar api ca tatas ca anyasa svaḥ lpa vīryaḥ

original: evamaśītivarṣāṇi mātuḥ sattvarajastamobhedena garbhasyādhiṣṭhānam || 80 ||
analyzed: evam aśīti varṣāṇi mātuḥ sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ bhedena garbhasya adhiṣṭhānam

original: tasmād yonī rajo na pratihataviṣayastadvināśānna seka: prajñābhiṣeko jinapativacanenaṃṣṭabījasya deyaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt yoniḥ rajaḥ na pratihata viṣayaḥ tad vināśāt na prajñā abhiṣekaḥ jinapati vacanena aṃṣṭa bījasya deyaḥ

original: tāsāṃ bhūtoyatejo'nilagagana guṇānveṣaṇīyā jināṅga - reṣā sattvārthakartrī bhavati bahuphalā bodhicittasya sevā || 81 ||
analyzed: tāsām bhū toya tejaḥ nila gagana guṇa anveṣaṇīyā jina aṅga reṣā sattva artha kartrī bhavati bahu phalā bodhi cittasya sevā

original: tasmādyonau rajo na pratihata garbhaviṣayaḥ, tadvināśāna sekaḥ prajñāyā upāyasya ca bījābhāve - bījamiti prarohāt yatkintu jñābhiṣeko jinapativacanairnaṣṭabojasya vṛddhasya deyo yathā bhikṣoḥ, tathā prajñāyāmapi yathā bhikṣuṇyāḥ
analyzed: tasmāt yonau rajaḥ na garbha viṣayaḥ sekaḥ prajñāyāḥ upāyasya ca bīja abhāve bījam iti prarohāt yat kintu jña abhiṣekaḥ jinapati vacanaiḥ naṣṭa bojasya vṛddhasya deyaḥ yathā bhikṣoḥ tathā

original: evaṃ viṃśadvārṣikāḥ śobhanāḥ sekārthamadhiṣṭhānārthaṃ bhūdhāturviṃśativiṃśativarṣaistathaiva toyatejo'nilagaganaguṇā varṣaśataṃ yāvajjanāṅgairanveṣaṇīyā iti
analyzed: evam viṃśat vārṣikāḥ śobhanāḥ seka artham adhiṣṭhāna artham bhūdhātuḥ viṃśati viṃśati varṣaiḥ tathā eva toya tejaḥ nila gagana guṇāḥ varṣa śatam yāvat jana aṅgaiḥ anveṣaṇīyāḥ

original: eṣā sattvārthakartrī bhavati bahuphalā bodhicittasya sevā bodhisattvotpādanata iti || 81 ||
analyzed: eṣā sattva artha kartrī bhavati bahu phalā bodhi cittasya sevā bodhisattva utpādanataḥ iti

original: idānīmamṛtapānamucyate- yā'sṛkpānaṃ karoti pravarasuranṛṇāṃ makṣikā sā'mṛtekā chadirguhyādivaktrāt kuliśamaṇigataṃ nābjamadhye praviṣṭam
analyzed: idānīm amṛta pānam ucyate yā sṛj pānam karoti pravara sura nṛṇām makṣikā sā mṛtā ekā chadiḥ guhya ādi vaktrāt kuliśamaṇi gatam na abja madhye praviṣṭam

original: viṇmūtraṃ raktamāṃsaṃ paramasamarasaṃ chardimadhye praviṣṭa- metajjñānāmṛtaṃ ca tribhuvanapatinā deśitaṃ sarvatantre ||82||
analyzed: viṣ mūtram rakta māṃsam parama sama rasam chardi madhye praviṣṭa metat jñāna amṛtam ca tribhuvana patinā deśitam sarva tantre

original: yā'sṛk pānamityādi
analyzed: yā sṛk pānam ityādi

original: iha bāhye neyārthena yā'sṛkpānaṃ karoti makṣikā, sā nītārthenāvadhūtī
analyzed: iha bāhye neya arthena yā sṛk pānam karoti makṣikā sā nīta arthena avadhūtī

original: yā cyavanakāle rajodhātuṃ pibati pravarasuranṛṇāṃ sā makṣikā'mṛtā, ekā'vadhūtī, ruddhetyarthaḥ
analyzed: yā cyavana kāle rajaḥ dhātum pibati pravara sura nṛṇām sā makṣikā mṛtā ekā vadhūtī ruddhā iti arthaḥ

original: yā bāhye bhuktacchaviḥ sā nītārthena chardirbodhicittam, guhyāvivaktrāt kuliśamaṇimataṃ na bāhye prajñābjamadhye praviṣṭam
analyzed: yā bāhye bhukta chaviḥ sā nīta arthena chardiḥ bodhi cittam guhyā vivaktrāt kuliśamaṇi matam na bāhye prajñā abja madhye praviṣṭam

original: evamacyutaṃ viṇmūtraṃ raktamāṃsaṃ paramasamarasam aśrāvaṃ chadimadhye praviṣṭaṃ niruddhaṃ nirāvaraṇaṃ bhavati
analyzed: evam acyutam viṣ mūtram rakta māṃsam parama sama rasam aśrāvam chadi madhye praviṣṭam niruddham nirāvaraṇam bhavati

original: eta- jjñānāmṛtaṃ syādacyutaṃ pañcāmṛtaṃ tribhuvana 'patinā deśitaṃ sarvatantre, na bāhye viṣṭhādikaṃ siddhaye deśitamityamṛta niyamaḥ || 82 ||
analyzed: etat jñāna amṛtam syāt acyutam pañcāmṛtam tribhuvana patinā deśitam sarva tantre na bāhye viṣṭhā ādikam siddhaye deśitam iti amṛta niyamaḥ

original: idānīṃ bāhye samayarakṣaṇabhakṣaṇamucyate- prajñādharmodaye yat patitamapi sukhaṃ rakṣaṇīyaṃ prayatnād yaḥ kaścittena sattvo bhavati jinakule bodhisattvaḥ sa eva
analyzed: idānīm bāhye samaya rakṣaṇa bhakṣaṇam ucyate prajñā dharma udaye yat patitam api sukham rakṣaṇīyam prayatnāt yaḥ kaścid tena sattvaḥ bhavati jina kule bodhisattvaḥ saḥ eva

original: tasmāt taṃ bhakṣayanti pratidinasamaye rākṣasā mārabhūtā: prajñāpuṣpeṇa yuktaṃ śivasukhaphaladaṃ bhakṣitaṃ deśayanti ||83 ||
analyzed: tasmāt tam bhakṣayanti prati dina samaye rākṣasāḥ māra bhūtā prajñā puṣpeṇa yuktam śiva sukha phala dam bhakṣitam deśayanti

original: prajñetyādi
iha samāpattī bhāvanāṃ kurvato yogino'yantritaṃ bodhicittaṃ yadi prajñādharmodaye patati, tadā prajñādharmodaye patitamapi sukhaṃ rakṣaṇīyaṃ prayatnāt
analyzed: iha samāpattī bhāvanām kurvataḥ yoginaḥ yantritam bodhi cittam yadi prajñā dharma udaye patati tadā prajñā dharma udaye patitam api sukham rakṣaṇīyam prayatnāt

original: tatkasya hetoḥ ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: yaḥ kaścittena bodhicittena samādhinotsṛṣṭena bhavati, sa jinakule bodhisattva eva sugatavaṃśapravardhano yasmāt tasmāt taṃ bodhicittaṃ saugatānāṃ rakṣārahitamasamāhitānāṃ pratidinasamaye bhakṣayanti mārabhūtā rākṣasāḥ śukrāhāriṇaḥ, yogivyapadeśena narā api prajñāpuṣpeṇa yuktaṃ śivasukhaphaladaṃ bhakṣitaṃ deśayanti
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid tena bodhi cittena samādhinā utsṛṣṭena bhavati sa jina kule bodhisattvaḥ eva sugata vaṃśa pravardhanaḥ yasmāt tasmāt tam bodhi cittam saugatānām rakṣā rahitam asamāhitānām prati dina

original: anyeṣāṃ bālajanānāṃ naraka- gamanāyeti || 83 ||
analyzed: anyeṣām bāla janānām naraka gamanāya iti

original: nākaṭyaṃ vajramabjāt paramasukhagataṃ saṃkucaṃ naiva yāvad buddhādhiṣṭhānamevaṃ prabhavati hi yadā kāmasiddhistadā vai
analyzed: nākaṭyam vajram abjāt parama sukha gatam saṃkucam nā eva yāvat buddha adhiṣṭhānam evam prabhavati hi yadā kāma siddhiḥ tadā vai

original: vajrābjābhyāṃ praviśya svakuliśahṛdaye jñānacakraṃ praviṣṭaṃ cakrākāraṃ karoti hyubhayatanumimāṃ raśmibhiḥ pūrayitvā || 84 ||
analyzed: vajra abjābhyām praviśya sva kuliśa hṛdaye jñāna cakram praviṣṭam cakra ākāram karoti hi ubhaya tanum imām raśmibhiḥ pūrayitvā

original: tato boddhamantriṇā nākaṭyaṃ vajramanjād yāvanna saṃkoco bhavati, buddhādhiṣṭhānamevaṃ prabhavati hi yadā kāma siddhistadā ve vajramārgeṇa upāyahṛdaye praviśya padmamārgeṇa prajñāhṛdaye praviśya 'svakuliśahṛdaye devatācakraṃ praviṣṭaṃ cakrākāraṃ karotyubhayatanumimāṃ raśmibhiḥ pūrayitveti || 84 ||
analyzed: tatas boddha mantriṇā nākaṭyam vajramanjāt yāvat na saṃkocaḥ bhavati buddha adhiṣṭhānam evam prabhavati hi yadā kāma siddhiḥ tadā vajra mārgeṇa upāya hṛdaye praviśya padma mārgeṇa prajñā

original: eṣā siddhiyaṃdi syānnahi kuliśamaṇau saṃsthitaṃ prajñādharmodayasthe sakalajinakulaṃ sthāpayed prajñāyukte tvartheke punarapi vacanaṃ procyate buddhakāyo yaḥ kaściccāsya nāśaṃ hyabhilaṣati śaṭho māryate vajriṇā saḥ || 85 ||
analyzed: eṣā syāt nahi kuliśa maṇau saṃsthitam prajñā dharma udaya sthe sakala jina kulam sthāpayet prajñā yukte tu artha ike punar api vacanam procyate buddha kāyaḥ yaḥ kaścid ca asya nāśam hi

original: eṣā siddhinaṃhi syādyadi, tadā kuliśamaṇau saṃsthitaṃ bodhicittamanāmāṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ gṛhotvā bhakṣaṇīyam
analyzed: eṣā syāt yadi tadā kuliśa maṇau saṃsthitam bodhi cittam anāma aṅguṣṭhābhyām bhakṣaṇīyam

original: evaṃ prajñāyāḥ[ [82b] padmabāhye āgataṃ tadeva dvābhyāmapi bhakṣaṇīyam
analyzed: evam prajñāyāḥ padma bāhye āgatam tat eva dvābhyām api bhakṣaṇīyam

original: prajñādharmodayasthe punaḥ sakalajinakulaṃ sthāpayedrakṣaṇārthaṃ ṣaḍvatrāṇi lalāṭādiṣu hṛdayādiṣu ṣaḍaṅgamiti
analyzed: prajñā dharma udaya sthe punar sakala jina kulam sthāpayet rakṣaṇa artham ṣaṣ vatrāṇi lalāṭa ādiṣu hṛdaya ādiṣu ṣaṣ aṅgam iti

original: prajñāyukta iti rajoyukte, arthake bodhicitte rakṣite mahatpuṇyaṃ bhavati
analyzed: prajñā yukte iti rajaḥ yukte arthake bodhi citte rakṣite mahat puṇyam bhavati

original: punarapi vacanaṃ procyate buddhakāya idaṃ bodhicittam
analyzed: punar api vacanam procyate buddha kāyaḥ idam bodhi cittam

original: yaḥ kaścid mārakāyiko'sya nāśa- mabhilaṣati śaṭho māryate vajriṇā sa herukeṇeti bodhicittasya samayarakṣaṇabhakṣaṇa- niyamaḥ || 85 ||
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid nāśam abhilaṣati śaṭhaḥ māryate vajriṇā sa herukeṇa iti bodhi cittasya samaya rakṣaṇa bhakṣaṇa niyamaḥ

original: ye proktā'nekamantrāstribhuvanapatinā krūrakarmasvabhāvā- ste sarve mārapakṣakṣayabhayajanakāḥ prāṇināṃ no kadācit
analyzed: ye proktāḥ neka mantrāḥ tribhuvana patinā krūra karma svabhāvāḥ ste sarve māra pakṣa kṣaya bhaya janakāḥ prāṇinām no kadācid

original: kartāro ye smṛtīnāṃ raṇaviṣayaratā mārakānye'pi tīrthyā- steṣāṃ te yojanīyāḥ paramajinasuteḥ prāṇināṃ rakṣaṇārtham || 86 ||

original: mānakastoyadhātubindoḥ svacchadravaṃ guhyakamale vajramaṇī gataṃ spandamityucyate, tasyācyutasukhavaśāttoyadhātustoṣaṇaṃ śarīre śaityaṃ karotītyarthaḥ
analyzed: mānakaḥ toya dhātu bindoḥ svaccha dravam guhya kamale vajramaṇī gatam spandam iti ucyate tasya acyuta sukha vaśāt toya dhātuḥ toṣaṇam śarīre śaityam karoti iti arthaḥ

original: punastatsthānādūrdhvagamanārthaṃ tadeva niḥṣyandasukhaṃ locanādayaḥ prabodhayanti vajragīti- kābhiḥ pūrvoktābhiḥ
analyzed: punar tad sthānāt ūrdhva gamana artham tat eva niḥṣyanda sukham locana ādayaḥ prabodhayanti vajragīti kābhiḥ pūrva uktābhiḥ

original: tato nābhau niṣyandanārthaṃ locanā codayati, hṛdaye māmakī vipākārtham, kaṇṭhe pāṇḍarā puruṣakārārtham, śirasi tārā vaimalyārtham

original: evamādibhi- rutthāpito mahāsukho vaimalyaṃ gataḥ sarvaskandhadhātvāyatanādikaṃ nirāvaraṇaṃ karoti

original: vimalaprabhāyāṃ [ jñāna- mārāṇāṃ tāḍanaṃ ve tribhuvananilaye nīladaṇḍaḥ karoti bandhaṃ krodho'calaśca pralayara vinibhaḥ kīlanaṃ cātivīryaḥ

original: ṭakkistadvīryanāśaṃ tvavanitalagataṃ stambhanaṃ stambha eva uṣṇīṣaścaddhināśaṃ prakaṭitaniyatāḥ pūrvavat krodhadevyaḥ || 109 ||
analyzed: ṭakkiḥ tad vīrya nāśam tu avani tala gatam stambhanam stambhaḥ eva uṣṇīṣaḥ ca ddhi nāśam prakaṭita niyatāḥ pūrvavat krodha devyaḥ

original: pretānāṃ pācanārthaṃ sphuraṇamapi tataścacikā debaṃbhūva indrādīnāṃ surāṇāṃ diśi vidiśi tathā rakṣaṇārthaṃ janānām
analyzed: pretānām pācana artham sphuraṇam api tatas cacikāḥ indra ādīnām surāṇām diśi vidiśi tathā rakṣaṇa artham janānām

original: sarvaṃ sattvārthahetorvaravividhaguṇaṃ anyad yatkiñcidasti spharaṇamapi vibhormaṇḍale bhūtajāntaṃ veditavyaṃ svakāye

original: evaṃ tantrāṇi mantrā vividhakulagatāḥ, yoginoyoga- bhedāllaukika siddhaya iti
analyzed: evam tantrāṇi mantrāḥ vividha kula gatāḥ yoginaḥ yoga bhedāt laukika siddhayaḥ iti

original: tat sarvaṃ laukikaṃ vai paramakaruṇayā darśitaṃ mārgahetoḥ seko lokottaro yaḥ paramajinapatedivyamudrānuṣaṅgaḥ || 112 ||

original: prajñetyādinā

original: iha yaddhasitekṣaṇapāṇyāptidvandva iti caturvidho'bhiṣeka ācārya - guhya- prajñā-jñānam, caturthaṃ punastathā śabdenoktaḥ samājādī paṭale, ślo

original: catuḥ kāyādiśuddhinirṇayamahoddeśaḥ kalaśādikaḥ, sa sekaḥ saṃketamātraṃ saṃvṛtyācāryakaraṇāya, na tattvam, “siktvā tattvaṃ prakāśayet” iti vacanāccaturvidhaḥ sekastattvaṃ na bhavati hasitekṣaṇapāṇyāptidvandvayoga iti

analyzed: kā bhataḥ bhagavataḥ niyamāt dvi indriya samāpattyā pi iyam mahāmudrā sva citta pratibhāsa mātrā yoginā bhāvanīyā bodhi paryantam bāhya indriya janitam kṣara sukham vihāya iti nanu tathāgatena uktam

analyzed: katham yogī sva citta pratibhāse sva cittena anuṣaṅgam kṛtvā sva cittam nirāvaraṇam karoti mahā akṣara sukha jñānam ca upabhuṅkte paramāṇu saṃdoha śarīra abhāvāt

original: etadeva viparītam devadatta ātmanaḥ skandhamāruhya grāmaṃ gacchatīti, iha kasyacidabhiprāyo bhaviṣyati, tasmāducyate - iha hi yadvaktavyaṃ mūrkhe: paramāṇusandohātmakaiḥ skandhadhātvāyatane- vinā cittamātreṇa prajñājñānaṃ svasaṃvedyaṃ na bhavati, tanna, kasmāt ?
analyzed: etat eva viparītam devadattaḥ ātmanaḥ skandham āruhya grāmam gacchati iti iha kasyacid abhiprāyaḥ bhaviṣyati tasmāt ucyate iha hi yat vaktavyam mūrkhe paramāṇu sandoha ātmakaiḥ skandha dhātu āyatane

analyzed: iha skandhātu āyatanam nāma āgantuka citta vāsanā tasyāḥ prasādena citte sukha duḥkha vedanā praviśati paramārthataḥ vicāryamāṇe na asya śarīrasya kṣudra upadraveṇa iti

original: iha paramāṇu saṃdohātmakaṃ śarīraṃ svapnāvasthāyāṃ prapatitaṃ tiṣṭhati, nāsya kṣudropadravaḥ kaści- dasti, yena citte duḥkhaṃ praviśati|

original: iha sarvalokeṣu prasiddham, tasyāmevāvasthāyāmanya- ccittavāsanātmakaṃ śarīraṃ paramāṇusandoharahitaṃ deśāntaraṃ vrajan pratibhāsate, tasya deśāntaraṃ vrajataḥ śarīrasya caurādibhirupadrave kṛte sati tenopadraveṇa citte duḥkhaṃ praviśati, tena duḥkhenākrandati|
analyzed: iha sarva lokeṣu prasiddham tasyām eva avasthāyām anya citta vāsanā ātmakam śarīram paramāṇu sandoha rahitam deśa antaram vrajan pratibhāsate tasya deśa antaram vrajataḥ śarīrasya caura ādibhiḥ

original: tadidaṃ mahātyadbhutam|

original: evaṃ svapne mahākāmopabhogaiścitte sukhaṃ praviśati tadevāścaryam, śarīreṇa vinā kāmopabhogavinā svasaṃvedyaṃ sukhajñānaṃ cittasya pravartate sattvānāmiti|

original: etadeva paṇḍitaivicārayituṃ na śakyate prādeśikajñānamapi kiṃ punaḥ saṃsāravāsanātikrāntaṃ nirvāṇavāsanodbhūtaṃ yogisvasaṃvedyaṃ samantabhadraṃ mahākṣarasukhajñānaṃ vitarkayituṃ na śakyate mūrkhe riti|

original: paṭale, ślo. ]
analyzed: paṭale ślo

original: paramākṣarajñānasiddhirnāma mahoddeśaḥ atha pāpamatīnāṃ tīthikānāṃ prāṇavāyutattvaratānāṃ vacanamidam - iha svapnāvasthāyāṃ paramāṇusandohātmakaśarīre niśvāsa- ucchvāso'sti , tayorniśvāsa - ucchvāsayoḥ prabhāvādavasthātrayaṃ bhavati, na niśvāsocchvāsābhāvāditi|
analyzed: paramākṣarajñānasiddhiḥ nāma mahā uddeśaḥ atha pāpamatīnām tīthikānām prāṇa vāyu tattva ratānām vacanam idam iha svapna avasthāyām paramāṇu sandoha ātmaka śarīre niśvāsaḥ ucchvāsaḥ sti tayoḥ

original: etadeva vicāryate - iha hi yadi niśvāsocchvāsābhyāṃ vinā citte svapnāvasthā nāsti, tadā kathaṃ mṛtyumūrcchāvasthāyāṃ niśvāsocchvāsābhyāṃ vinā praharamekaṃ yāvaccittapratibhāso bhavati, yamadūtairnīyamānaṃ śarīraṃ yamarājājñayā yamapuraṃ pratibhāsate|

analyzed: vicārya atra vadati yathā syāt yā yuḥ kṣayaḥ na bhavati tasmāt imam sattvam śīghram martya loke nayata yāvat asya śarīram na vinaśyati

original: arūpiṇāṃ nāhārikaṃ śarīram, paramāṇu- sandohātmakaśarīrābhāvāt śukracyutirnāsti, śukracyuterabhāvānna sukhaṃ na saṃsārasteṣā- miti

original: tadyathā dehe'smin dhātuvṛndaṃ bhavati ca sakalaṃ ṣaḍrasāhārapānād bhūtebhya: ṣaḍrasāśca prakaṭitaniyataṃ bhūtavṛndaṃ khadhātoḥ

analyzed: kutas ṣaṣ rasa āhāra pānāt ṣaṭ ca te rasāḥ ṣaṭ rasāḥ loma ādi dhātu svarūpam gacchanti iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: evaṃ śūnyāt sarvadharmā bhavantīti śūnye jñānaṃ vimiśramiti śūnyadharmāṇāmutpāda- nirodhābhāvaḥ svacittapratibhāsaḥ

original: jñānaṃ tatpratibodho'kṣarasukham, tasmin svacittā - bhāse utpādavināśābhāve jñānaṃ vimiśrama, svacittapratibhāse samarasame kobhavati, na jñānajñeyasambandhena

original: tatra “atha vajraghara: śrīmān ityādinā prakāyasthito'grataḥ iti paryantamadhyeṣaṇāślokāḥ ṣoḍaśa, atha śākya- munirbhagavān ityādinā tatsādhu bhagavan iti paryantaṃ prativacanaślokāḥ ṣaṭ, punaḥ atha ādināmataḥ uṣṇīṣakulaṃ mahat iti paryantaṃ ṣaṭkulāvalokaślokadvayam, imaṃ ṣaṇmantrarājānam ityādinā arapacanāya te namaḥ iti paryantaṃ māyājāla - sambodhikrame ślokatrayam, tadyathā bhagavān buddhaḥ ityādinā mahāyānanayottamaḥ”
analyzed: tatra atha vajraghara śrīmān ityādinā prakāya sthitaḥ gratas iti paryantam adhyeṣaṇā ślokāḥ ṣoḍaśa atha śākya muniḥ bhagavān ityādinā tat sādhu bhagavan iti paryantam prativacana ślokāḥ

analyzed: iti paryantam vajra dhātu mahā maṇḍala stava ślokāḥ caturdaśa mahāverocanaḥ buddhaḥ ityādinā vajra āśaḥ mahā pāśaḥ iti paryantam su viśuddha dharmadhātu jñāna stava ślokāḥ pādona pañca

original: vajrabhairavabhokaraḥ ityādinā ghoṣo ghoṣavatāṃvaraḥ iti paryantamādarśajñāna- ślokāḥ pādādhikadaśa

original: iṣṭārthasādhakaḥ ityādinā ratna- keturmahāmaṇiḥ iti paryantaṃ samatājñānastavaślokāścaturviṃśatiḥ

analyzed: sarva sambuddha boddhavyaḥ ityādinā mañjuśrīḥ śrīmatām varaḥ iti paryantam kṛtyā anuṣṭhāna jñāna stava ślokāḥ pañcadaśa

original: ebhirdvāṣaṣṭyadhikaśataślokaiḥ sarvayāneṣūddhatya saṃgṛhītaṃ vajradhara- bhagavato hṛdayaṃ samantabhadraṃ paramākṣaramahāsukhamākāśadhātuparyantaṃ samantādavabhāsamānaṃ viśuddhajñānasambhārasambhūtaṃ gambhīrodārarūpadharaṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaramanādinidhanamātramātmīya- grāhyagrāhakādivikalpamalarahitaṃ sarvakālamasaṃkliṣṭaṃ sarvadharmasva bhāvajñaṃ saṃsāra- vāsanāvinirmuktaṃ gatāgatavirahitaṃ niṣprapañcarūpaṃ svarasapravṛttijṛmbhitavividhasamādhi- dhāraṇīnāmādhāraṃ bhadraghaṭakalpapādapacintāmaṇivat sarvasattvāśāparipūrakaṃ mahāmunīnā- mapyagocaraṃ mahataḥ sattvarāśeḥ paramaśāntikaraṃ māyopamaṃ svapnopamaṃ pratibimbopamaṃ prati- śrutkopamam
analyzed: ebhiḥ dvāṣaṣṭi adhika śata ślokaiḥ sarva yāneṣu uddhatya saṃgṛhītam vajradhara bhagavataḥ hṛdayam samanta bhadram parama akṣara mahā sukham ākāśa dhātu paryantam samantāt avabhāsamānam sarva sattva āśā paripūrakam mahāmunīnām api agocaram mahataḥ sattva rāśeḥ parama śānti karam māyā upamam svapna upamam pratibimba upamam prati śrutkā upamam

original: tena ṛto mande mandabhoge randhrā iti navaghaṭikābhogo rāśicakre, tāśca ḍākinyaḥ
analyzed: tena ṛto mande manda bhoge randhrāḥ iti nava ghaṭikā bhogaḥ rāśi cakre tāḥ ca ḍākinyaḥ

original: paṭale, ślo
analyzed: paṭale ślo

original: ] nānopāyavineyamahoddeśaḥ evaṃ vinākhyā iti [2092 ] pañcadaśeti 'rātrī bhoge suraguroḥ sārdhanetrākṣisaṃkhyā iti sārdhadvāviṃśaditi, ekībhūtāḥ sārdhāḥ ṣaḍ vedajātā iti sārdhaṣaṭcatvāriṃśaditi
analyzed: nānā upāya vineya mahoddeśaḥ evam vinā ākhyāḥ iti pañcadaśa iti rātrī bhoge suraguroḥ sārdha netra akṣi saṃkhyāḥ iti sārdha dvāviṃśat iti ekībhūtāḥ sa ardhāḥ ṣaṭ veda jātāḥ iti

original: parama jinapate citavanodbhavāstā iti cittabindujanitā ityarthaḥ
analyzed: parama jinapate cita vana udbhavāḥ tāḥ iti citta bindu janitāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: bhaume śūnyāhicandrā iti prapañcaḥ
analyzed: bhaume śūnya ahi candrāḥ iti prapañcaḥ

original: tasya maṇḍalena yallabhyate ṣaṣṭibhāgena tāvatyo nāḍya iti niyamaḥ, sāmānyenāśītyuttaraśatam
analyzed: tasya maṇḍalena yat labhyate ṣaṣṭi bhāgena tāvatyaḥ nāḍyaḥ iti niyamaḥ sāmānyena aśītyuttaraśatam

original: iha yatra maṅgalasya ūno bhāgastatra ravikābhogo na hartavyaḥ, candrabhogo māsaikaḥ kṣepaṇīyaḥ
analyzed: iha yatra maṅgalasya ūnaḥ bhāgaḥ tatra ravikā bhogaḥ na hartavyaḥ candra bhogaḥ māsa ekaḥ kṣepaṇīyaḥ

original: iha maṅgalasya trayoviṃśatimāseḥ svadinaṃ lokarūḍhyā aṣṭādaśamāsaiḥ, tanna ghaṭate, tenātra yathābhūtaṃ varṣaśataṃ grahāṇāṃ maṇḍala dinerbhavati, aṣṭamāsaika- viṃśatidinādhikamiti niyamaḥ
analyzed: iha maṅgalasya sva dinam loka rūḍhyā aṣṭādaśa māsaiḥ tat na ghaṭate tena atra yathābhūtam varṣa śatam grahāṇām bhavati aṣṭa māsa eka viṃśati dina adhikam iti niyamaḥ

original: evaṃ bhaume śūnyāhicandrāḥ
analyzed: evam bhaume śūnya ahi candrāḥ

original: ravibudhabhūguketośca śūnyāhikhaikā ityaṣṭāśītyuttarasahasram
analyzed: ravi budha bhūgu ketoḥ ca śūnya ahi kha ekāḥ iti aṣṭāśīti uttara sahasram

original: eṣāṃ pañcagrahāṇāmekatra bhogāt khākṣyakṣye- kāśca jātā iti viṃśatyadhikadviśatādhikaikasahasram
analyzed: eṣām pañca grahāṇām ekatra bhogāt kha akṣi akṣye kāḥ ca jātāḥ iti viṃśati adhika dviśata adhika eka sahasram

original: khalu paramavibhoḥ śuddhavāgudbha- vāstā iti vāgbandujanitā ityarthaḥ || 134||
analyzed: khalu parama vibhoḥ iti vāgbandu janitāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yā candrasyartubhuktiḥ khakharasaśikhinaḥ kāyavajrodbhavāstā ekībhūtāḥ samastā rasaṣaḍahiyugāścārdhanāḍīstathaiva
analyzed: yā candrasya ṛtu bhuktiḥ kha kha rasa śikhinaḥ kāya vajra udbhavāḥ tāḥ ekībhūtāḥ samastāḥ rasa ṣaṣ ahi yugāḥ ca ardha nāḍīḥ tathā eva

original: ḍākinyaḥ kālarūpāḥ sakalatanugatāḥ prāṇināṃ prāṇahantrya- stasmāttāḥ sādhanīyāḥ pratidinasamaye rodhayitvā svamāgam || 135 ||
analyzed: ḍākinyaḥ kāla rūpāḥ sakala tanu gatāḥ prāṇinām prāṇa hantryaḥ stasmāt tāḥ sādhanīyāḥ prati dina samaye rodhayitvā svam āgam

original: yā candrasyartabhuktiḥ khakharasaśikhina iti ṣaṭśatādhikasahasratrayaṃ ghaṭikābhogaḥ, kāyavajtrodbhavāstā iti kāryābindudbhavā iti
analyzed: yā candrasya ṛta bhuktiḥ kha kha rasa śikhinaḥ iti ṣaṣ śata adhika sahasra trayam ghaṭikā ābhogaḥ kāya vajtra udbhavāḥ tāḥ iti iti

original: ekībhūtāḥ samastā navānāṃ rasabaḍahi- yugā iti ṣaṭṣaṣṭyadhikāṣṭaśatādhikasahasracatuṣkam, ardhanāḍī tathaiveti saṃkhyā ḍākinīnāmekartī
analyzed: ekībhūtāḥ samastāḥ navānām yugāḥ iti ṣaṭṣaṣṭi adhika aṣṭaśata adhika sahasra catuṣkam ardha nāḍī tathā eva iti saṃkhyā ḍākinīnām ekartī

original: tā ḍākinyaḥ kālarūpāḥ sakalatanugatā devādīnāṃ prāṇināṃ prāṇahantrya ekartī

original: ṣaḍṛtuṣu punarayutadvayaṃ navasahasraśatamekaṃ ṣaṇṇavatyadhikamiti ḍākinīsaṃkhyā sattvānāṃ grahacaraṇāntarbhūtā iti niyamaḥ
analyzed: ṣaṣ ṛtuṣu punar ayuta dvayam nava sahasra śatam ekam ṣaṇṇavati adhikam iti ḍākinī saṃkhyā sattvānām graha caraṇa antarbhūtā iti niyamaḥ

original: tasmāttāḥ sāghanīyāḥ prati- dinasamaye roṣayitvā svamāgaṃ tāsāṃ prāṇāpānanirodhena catubindunirodheneti niyamaḥ || 135 ||
analyzed: tasmāt tāḥ sāghanīyāḥ prati dina samaye roṣayitvā sva māgam tāsām prāṇa apāna nirodhena catu bindu nirodhena iti niyamaḥ

original: yāvadbhaktirgrahāṇāṃ svaparagatigatā śvāsaniḥśvāsacārāt tāvat kiṃ kāladūtī prabhavati varadā vyāpinī yā tridhātau
analyzed: yāvat bhaktiḥ grahāṇām sva para gati gatā śvāsa niḥśvāsa cārāt tāvat kim kāladūtī prabhavati vara dā vyāpinī yā tridhātau

original: dūto sūkṣmapracāro guruvacanagato bodhicitte'kṣare ca jñātavyo yogayuktervyapagata kaluṣairnānyathā rāgacittaiḥ || 136 ||
analyzed: sūkṣma pracāraḥ guru vacana gataḥ bodhi citte kṣare ca jñātavyaḥ yoga yukteḥ vyapagata kaluṣaiḥ na anyathā rāga cittaiḥ

original: dvitīyavṛttenoktā yāvadityādinā subodhamiti || 136 ||

original: vimalaprabhāyāṃ idānīṃ candracaraṇe rāhupraveśa ucyate- mārtaṇḍendvoḥ padānyapyubhayagativaśāt tṛṣṇayā tāḍitāni aṅgerbhāgāvaśeṣaṃ prasati saṃ caraṇaṃ rāhuveśe ca ketuḥ
analyzed: vimalaprabhāyām idānīm candra caraṇe rāhupraveśaḥ ucyate mārtaṇḍa indvoḥ padāni api ubhaya gati vaśāt tṛṣṇayā tāḍitāni aṅgeḥ bhāga avaśeṣam sam caraṇam rāhu veśe ca ketuḥ

original: sarvāḥ sandhyāṣṭayāmāḥ pratidinasamaye prāṇināṃ dvādaśāṅgāḥ śvāsāścaikaikalagne dviguṇanavaśataprāṇavāhāṅgamuktam ||137||
analyzed: sarvāḥ sandhyā aṣṭa yāmāḥ prati dina samaye prāṇinām dvādaśa aṅgāḥ śvāsāḥ ca ekaika lagne dviguṇa nava śata prāṇa vāha aṅgam uktam

original: mārtaṇḍetyādi
analyzed: mārtaṇḍa ityādi

original: iha mārtaṇḍapadānyekādaśa rasayugaśaśinaḥ iti pūrvoktāni, indupadāni pañcaviṃśad bhūtā bhūteṣu ityādinā, anayorekatra militāni ṣaṭtriṃśad bhavanti

original: evamekapakṣo hrasvaḥ, māso dīrghaḥ, ṛtuḥ plutaḥ

original: evaṃ pañcaprakāraiḥ ṛturapi ca bhavet

original: paṭale, ślo
analyzed: paṭale ślo

original: ] nānopāyavineyamahoddeśaḥ ṣaṇmāsartutrayeṇa grahaṇamapi bhaved dvādaśāṅgapratītyā ṣaṣṭho'rkasyartubhedaścaraṇagativaśāccandramadhye praviṣṭaḥ
analyzed: nānā upāya vineya mahā uddeśaḥ ṣaṣ māsa ṛtu trayeṇa grahaṇam api bhavet dvādaśa aṅga pratītyā ṣaṣṭhaḥ rkasya ṛtu bhedaḥ caraṇa gati vaśāt candra madhye praviṣṭaḥ

analyzed: tasmin sparśa aṅga madhye grasati sa caraṇam rāhuḥ indu arkayoḥ ca oṣadhyaḥ siddhi dāḥ tāḥ dina niśi samaye rāhuṇā lokitāḥ ye

original: candrakalāṃ tridinaghaṭikonāṃ kṛtvā trayodaśa śeṣāstrayaḥ pañcāśaditi grahaṇe'māvasyā bhoge deyā, ravikā heyā vā

original: iha bhaumādayo grahā meṣādirāśī kṣetriṇaḥ

original: pratidinasamaye dvādaśalagnodaye kṣetriṇaḥ sarvakālaṃ bhoktāra ityarthaḥ

original: yadi kṣetriṇī nakṣatra- bhogavaśenāsmin svakṣetre yadi syāttadā nānyasmin kāle'nyagraheṇādhiṣṭhito rāśi - statphaladāyako bhavati pūrvoktakarmasviti niyamaḥ || 140 ||

original: ākṛṣṭau

original: ūrṇāsīmno lalāṭe śirasi tata ihoṣṇīṣaparyantameṣā evaṃ vai lokadhātuḥ sakalajinatanuścakracetya svarūpaḥ || 184 ||

original: pīṭhāditi

original: pīṭhordhvataḥ padmāsanasyocchrayo vedairiti caturaṅguleḥ padmam, evaṃ hṛvigatavalayaṃ caturaṅgulam, kaṇṭhamānaṃ ca tadvaccatubhiḥ sārdhāṣṭaiḥ vaktramānamiti cibu- kānmukhāntaṃ sārdhacatubhiḥ, nāsikāntaṃ caturbhiḥ, tata ūrṇāsthānaṃ bhruvormadhye
analyzed: pīṭha ūrdhvataḥ padmāsanasya ucchrayaḥ vedaiḥ iti catur aṅguleḥ padmam evam catur aṅgulam kaṇṭha mānam ca tadvat catubhiḥ sārdha aṣṭaiḥ vaktra mānam iti cibu kāt mukha antam sārdha catubhiḥ

original: atra mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni, tadyathā – tathāgatasya cakrāṅkitapāṇipādatalo, cakre sahasrāre paripūrṇa sanābhike supratiṣṭhitapādatalo, sarvapādatalena pṛthvoṃ spṛśati, sā'pyu- unnamite pādatale unnamati namite namati, jālāvanaddhe pāṇipādatale rājahaṃsasyeva jālinī- yuto hastau pādau jātabālasyevātimṛdutarī, saptotsada iti dvayoḥ pādayorhastayoḥ skandhayoḥ kaṇṭhe'pi utsada iti

original: - pṛthvītyādi
iha pṛthvī syāddhemadhāturiti hema pṛthvīsvabhāvaṃ pītam, rajataṃ toya- svabhāvaṃ dhavalam, tāmraṃ vahnisvabhāvaṃ raktam, ayo vāyusvabhāvaṃ kṛṣṇam, trapu nāgaṃ ca miśramiti

original: || iha pṛthvojātirmaṇirvā ratnaṃ vā śūlāpahārī bhavati, toyajāti- viṣāpahārī bhavati bhūtāveśāpahārī agnijātiḥ, stambhanāpahārī vāyujātiḥ, kṣudra- vṛṣṭiprapātāpahārī śūnyajātiḥ, jñānajātiḥ sarvadoṣāpahārī

original: || nānopāyavineyamahoddeśaḥ bāhye jyotiṣkacakrāṇyavanitalagatāḥ karmabhūmyāṃ manuṣyāḥ ṣaḍdvī pābhogabhūmyāmamṛtaphalarasāhāriṇo'nye surādyāḥ

original: tārakārye śvetamākṣikena tāraṃ mārayet, tālakena vaṅgaṃ mārayet, ghanajamapi śvetābhrakalohaṃ mākṣikena mārayet

original: tato'mṛta lohatulyāni catvāri kṣārāṇi, eṣāṃ samagrāṇāmabhāve trayo dvau vā viḍaṃ ca tulyam, lavaṇāni tulyāni, uparasān śatrudharmiṇaḥ, lohatulyaḥ sūtakaḥ, sarvamekīkṛtya pittamatsyādīnāmamlairbījapūrakādīnāṃ daśadinaṃ mardayitvā tatsarvapāṣāṇakhaṇḍān saṃpuṭe prakṣipya tato bhūmyāṃ nidhāpya upari agninā sveditaḥ sarvakālaṃ ṣaṇmāsaṃ yāvaditi
analyzed: tatas mṛta loha tulyāni catvāri kṣārāṇi eṣām samagrāṇām abhāve trayaḥ dvau vā viḍam ca tulyam lavaṇāni tulyāni uparasān śatrudharmiṇaḥ loha tulyaḥ sūtakaḥ sarvam ekīkṛtya pitta matsya ādīnām

original: tato baddho bhavati
analyzed: tatas baddhaḥ bhavati

original: tataḥ ṣaṇmāsāt [217b] tasya tāmrasya vedho bhavati
analyzed: tatas ṣaṣ māsāt tasya tāmrasya vedhaḥ bhavati

original: ṣoḍaśāṃśena punastadeva viddhaṃ tānaṃ raupyaṃ hematulyabhāgaṃ kṛtvā puṭenodghāṭayet
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa aṃśena punar tat eva viddham tānam raupyam hema tulya bhāgam kṛtvā puṭena udghāṭayet

original: śubhakanakamidaṃ bhavati vādināṃ duḥkhanāśamiti
analyzed: śubha kanakam idam bhavati vādinām duḥkha nāśam iti

original: atha tārādisaṃnyāsena bandhaḥ, tadā śuddhaṃ tānaṃ viddhaṃ tāraṃ bhavati, aṣṭāṃśena tāre datte satīti saṃnyāsabandhaniyamaḥ
analyzed: atha tāra ādi saṃnyāsena bandhaḥ tadā śuddham tānam viddham tāram bhavati aṣṭa aṃśena tāre datte sati iti saṃnyāsa bandha niyamaḥ

original: athādibuddhokto golakabandha ucyate - iha hemakārye pītābhrakādikamantrakaṃ kiñci- jjārayet, 'sakalaṃ vā ardhaṃ vā
analyzed: atha ādi buddha uktaḥ golakabandhaḥ ucyate iha hema kārye pīta abhraka ādika mantrakam kiñcid jārayet sakalam vā ardham vā

original: tārakārye śvetābhrakam
tato hemakārye nāgena piṣṭaṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ [ jñāna- kārayet, tāre vaṅgena
analyzed: tatas hema kārye nāgena piṣṭam vimala prabhāyām tāre vaṅgena

original: tato hemapatreṇa taṃ veṣṭayet
analyzed: tatas hema patreṇa tam veṣṭayet

original: tārapatreṇa tārakārye
analyzed: tāra patreṇa tāra kārye

original: tathā hemapatro- pari manaḥśilāṃ piṣṭvā gomūtreṇa tayā pralepo deyaḥ
analyzed: tathā manaḥśilām piṣṭvā go mūtreṇa tayā pralepaḥ deyaḥ

original: tato bāhye daradena
analyzed: tatas bāhye daradena

original: tataḥ kumbhakāra- mṛttikayā veṣṭayet tataḥ śuṣke punargomayena veṣṭayet punastīvrātapena śuṣkaṃ kṛtvā gokarṣāgninā mṛdupuṭaṃ deyam
analyzed: tatas kumbhakāra mṛttikayā veṣṭayet tatas śuṣke punar gomayena veṣṭayet punar tīvra ātapena śuṣkam kṛtvā go karṣa agninā mṛdupuṭam deyam

original: tato bhasmano'pakṛtya mṛdgolakaṃ koṣṭhikāyāṃ tīvrāṅgārairdhamet, yāvanmahārasoparasa hemanāgapiṣṭī : samarasībhavanti
analyzed: tatas bhasmanā upakṛtya mṛd golakam koṣṭhikāyām tīvra aṅgāraiḥ dhamet yāvat mahārasa uparasa hema nāga piṣṭī samarasībhavanti

original: tataḥ śītībhūtaṃ golakaṃ bhedayitvā madhye yatsuvarṇena saha piṣṭikayā yadyogena golakabandhaḥ, tadeva tāmre catuṣṣaṣṭyaṃśena kṣiptaṃ pūrvavad hema tāraṃ vā bhavatoti golakabandho mūlatantre || 221-222 ||
analyzed: tatas śītībhūtam golakam bhedayitvā madhye yat suvarṇena saha piṣṭikayā yat yogena golaka bandhaḥ tat eva tāmre catuṣṣaṣṭi aṃśena kṣiptam pūrvavat hema tāram vā bhavati iti golaka bandhaḥ

original: idānīṃ kṣetralohebaṃndha ucyate- pāṣāṇā ye dharaṇyāṃ phalatanusadṛśāḥ śaṅkhamuṇḍādirūpā- stadyoniṃ teṣu dattvā ghṛtamadhusahitā dhāmayet tīvravāteḥ
analyzed: idānīm kṣetralohebaṃndhaḥ ucyate pāṣāṇāḥ ye dharaṇyām phala tanu sadṛśāḥ śaṅkha muṇḍa ādi rūpāḥ tad yonim teṣu dattvā ghṛta madhu sahitāḥ dhāmayet tīvra vāteḥ

original: śuddhi kṛtdā niṣekaiḥ punarapi ca punaṣṭaṅgaṇakṣāravarge- rjñātvā tallohayoniṃ dviguṇamapi rase vādinā jāraṇīyam || 223 ||
analyzed: niṣekaiḥ punar api ca punar ṭaṅgaṇa kṣāra varge jñātvā tat loha yonim dviguṇam api rase vādinā jāraṇīyam

original: pāṣāṇetyādi
analyzed: pāṣāṇa ityādi

original: iha pṛthivyāṃ ye pāṣāṇā nānājīvākārā nānāphalādyākārāḥ, tadeva yonisteṣāṃ dasthā jīvānāṃ jīvamāṃsaṃ phalānāṃ phalacūrṇaṃ śaṅkhatakārādīnāṃ śaṅkhādi- cūrṇaṃ dattvā teṣāṃ cūrṇaṃ tena cūrṇena sārdhaṃ ghṛtamadhuṭaṅgaṇasahitavaṭakān kṛtvā lohapātana- vastreṇa tīvraṃ dhāmayet yāvallohaṃ patati
analyzed: iha pṛthivyām ye pāṣāṇāḥ nānā jīva ākārāḥ nānā phala ādi ākārāḥ tat eva yoniḥ teṣām jīvānām jīva māṃsam phalānām phala cūrṇam śaṅkha takāra ādīnām śaṅkha ādi cūrṇam

original: punarniṣekoddhṛte punaṣṭaṅgaṇaṃ dattvā śodhayed yāvadviśuddhaṃ bhavati
analyzed: punar niṣeka uddhṛte punar ṭaṅgaṇam dattvā śodhayet yāvat viśuddham bhavati

original: evaṃ śuddhi kṛtvā tadyoni jñātmā tīkṣṇaṃ tāmraṃ vā hemena saha dvandvaṃ
analyzed: evam tīkṣṇam tāmram vā hemena saha dvandvam

original: kṛtvā tadeva vādinā dviguṇaṃ jāraṇīyam
analyzed: kṛtvā tat eva vādinā dviguṇam jāraṇīyam

original: pūrvamabhrakaṃ jārayitvā saṃmukhaṃ vā nirmukhaṃ vā tato'nyāni lohādīni jāraṇī- yāni
analyzed: pūrvam abhrakam jārayitvā saṃmukham vā nirmukham vā tatas nyāni loha ādīni jāraṇī yāni

original: evaṃ mākṣikaṃ tāmraṃ svarṇaṃ jārayet, tutthakaṃ tāmraṃ svarṇaṃ vā, rājāvartakatā svarṇaṃ vā, śaśakatā svarṇaṃ vā
analyzed: evam mākṣikam tāmram svarṇam jārayet tutthakam tāmram svarṇam vā rājāvartaka tā svarṇam vā śaśaka tā svarṇam vā

original: iha yathā kṣetrapāṣāṇānāṃ lohaṃ pātayet, tathā mākṣikā- dīnāṃ vimalādīnāṃ śodhayet
analyzed: iha yathā kṣetrapāṣāṇānām loham pātayet tathā mākṣika ādīnām vimalā ādīnām śodhayet

original: tataḥ pūrvakarmakarāṇi bhavanti, anyathā dravyaṃ vināśayanti
analyzed: tatas pūrva karmakarāṇi bhavanti anyathā dravyam vināśayanti

original: athādau vādināṃ jīvanopāyaḥ kathyate yena bhuktamātramakleśena [ jīṇaṃ ] bhavati
analyzed: atha ādau vādinām jīvana upāyaḥ kathyate yena bhukta mātram akleśena jīṇam bhavati

original: iha jārita rasena patralepena hermāddhakā bhavati, asāritena kumāreṇa bālena vā
analyzed: iha jārita rasena pattra lepena bhavati asāritena kumāreṇa bālena vā

original: atra puna- stribhāgikādalaikaṃ hemadvayenocyate
analyzed: atra punar hema dvayena ucyate

original: atra prathamaṃ tāmraṃ lavaṇakāñjikena patraṃ kṛtvā niṣekayed yāvaccūrṇaṃ bhavati
analyzed: atra prathamam tāmram lavaṇa kāñjikena patram kṛtvā niṣekayet yāvat cūrṇam bhavati

original: tatastoyaṃ dattvā lavaṇadoṣamapahṛtya tataḥ śoṣayet
analyzed: tatas toyam dattvā lavaṇa doṣam apahṛtya tatas śoṣayet

original: tataḥ saindhavaṃ ṣoḍaśāṃśena dattvā bojapurakādyamlena mardayitvā puṭe pācayet
analyzed: tatas saindhavam ṣoḍaśa aṃśena dattvā bojapuraka ādi amlena mardayitvā puṭe pācayet

original: evaṃ punaḥ punaḥ saindhavaṃ dattvā puṭe pācayet saptāṣṭavāram [218 ] yāvad iṣṭakādhūlisadṛśaṃ kiñcit śyāmaṃ bhavati
analyzed: evam punar punar saindhavam dattvā puṭe pācayet sapta aṣṭa vāram yāvat iṣṭakā dhūli sadṛśam kiñcid śyāmam bhavati

original: tato madhughṛtaṭaṅgaṇena vaṭikāṃ kṛtvā pūrvavallohaṃ pātayet
analyzed: tatas madhu ghṛta ṭaṅgaṇena vaṭikām kṛtvā pūrvavat loham pātayet

original: tato malarahitamardhamātraṃ labheta
analyzed: tatas mala rahitam ardha mātram labheta

original: punastadeva patraṃ kṛtvā gandhakena pādāgaṃ daradaṃ dattvā puṭairmārayet
analyzed: punar tat eva patram kṛtvā gandhakena pādāgam daradam dattvā puṭaiḥ mārayet

original: taccūrṇaṃ punā rasenāṣṭāṃśena saha rasadviguṇaṃ gandhakaṃ rasārdhena daradaṃ dattvā madayedamlena, punaḥ svedayet
analyzed: tat cūrṇam rasena aṣṭa aṃśena saha rasa dviguṇam gandhakam rasa ardhena daradam dattvā madayet amlena punar svedayet

original: kharpare punarmardayet saptāham
analyzed: kharpare punar mardayet sapta aham

original: tadeva saṃkīrṇamukhavṛttabhāṇḍe kumbhakāraghaṭite prakṣipet
analyzed: tat eva saṃkīrṇa mukha vṛtta bhāṇḍe kumbhakāra ghaṭite prakṣipet

original: paṭale, 221-224 ślo. ] nānopāya vineyamahoddeśaḥ bhāṇḍamukhaṃ kumbhakāramṛttikayā mṛdrayet
analyzed: paṭale nānā upāya vineya mahā uddeśaḥ bhāṇḍa mukham kumbhakāra mṛttikayā mṛdrayet

original: bhāṇḍasyāpi bāhyalepo deyo'ṅgulai kocchrito nālikerapramāṇaḥ, vistāre'dhiko na deyaḥ
analyzed: bhāṇḍasya api bāhya lepaḥ deyaḥ ṅgulaiḥ ka ucchritaḥ nālikera pramāṇaḥ vistāre dhikaḥ na deyaḥ

original: tata ātape śoṣayet
analyzed: tatas ātape śoṣayet

original: punarupari gomayena lepa- yet, punaḥ śoṣayed yāvad gomayaṃ śuṣkaṃ bhavati
analyzed: punar upari gomayena punar śoṣayet yāvat gomayam śuṣkam bhavati

original: tataḥ puṭena pācayet
analyzed: tatas puṭena pācayet

original: evaṃ tāmracūrṇa- māliṅgaya raso mriyate tāmraṃ ca nirdoṣaṃ bhavati, parasparayogāditi
analyzed: evam tāmra cūrṇam māliṅgaya rasaḥ mriyate tāmram ca nirdoṣam bhavati paraspara yogāt iti

original: tatastārasya pādāṃśaṃ svarṇaṃ dattvā svarṇadviguṇaṃ tāmraṃ dattvā'bhramūṣāyāṃ dhamedyāvat sarvaṃ samarasaṃ bhavati
analyzed: tatas tārasya pāda aṃśam svarṇam dattvā svarṇa dviguṇam tāmram dattvā bhramūṣāyām dhamet yāvat sarvam sama rasam bhavati

original: tataḥ śītībhūte kapālikāmapahṛtya punaḥ pādāṃśaṃ svarṇaṃ dattvā svarṇadviguṇaṃ tāmraṃ pūrva- vaddhāmayet, tataḥ śītobhūte kapālikāmapahṛtya hemārdhena hemaṃ bhavati puṭadvayena viśuddhamiti
analyzed: tatas śītībhūte kapālikām apahṛtya punar pāda aṃśam svarṇam dattvā svarṇa dviguṇam tāmram tatas śītobhūte kapālikām apahṛtya hema ardhena hemam bhavati puṭa dvayena viśuddham iti

original: athāparaḥ prayoga ucyate – etaccūrṇaṃ hemni dviguṇaṃ vā triguṇaṃ vā nirvāhayet
analyzed: atha aparaḥ prayogaḥ ucyate etat cūrṇam hemni dviguṇam vā triguṇam vā nirvāhayet

original: tena pādāṃśena rase piṭikāṃ kṛtvā iṣṭakagarbhāyāṃ prakṣipya upari gandhakacūrṇaṃ datvā tadupari pidhānaṃ dattvā taduparyaṅgārān dhamet kṣaṇamātram
analyzed: tena pāda aṃśena rase piṭikām kṛtvā iṣṭakā garbhāyām prakṣipya upari gandhaka cūrṇam datvā tad upari pidhānam dattvā tad upari aṅgārān dhamet kṣaṇa mātram

original: tataḥ śotībhūte punaḥ punaḥ piṣṭi- su tulyaṃ gandhakaṃ dattvā nirdahedaṣṭavārān
analyzed: tatas śotībhūte punar punar gandhakam dattvā nirdahet aṣṭa vārān

original: tato raso hemāliṅgayati, na muñcati
analyzed: tatas rasaḥ hema āliṅgayati na muñcati

original: tatastārasya pādāṃśaṃ bījaṃ dattvā tadeva tāmraṃ tārasamaṃ dattvā'bhramūṣāyāṃ dhamet
analyzed: tatas tārasya pāda aṃśam bījam dattvā tat eva tāmram tāra samam dattvā bhramūṣāyām dhamet

original: tataḥ śītobhūte kapālikāmapahṛtya taddalaṃ patraṃ kārayet
analyzed: tatas śītobhūte kapālikām apahṛtya tat dalam patram kārayet

original: tayā piṣṭyā patralepaṃ kārayet
analyzed: tayā piṣṭyā patra lepam kārayet

original: tāmbūlapatrarasena krāmaṇārthamupari lepayet
analyzed: tāmbūla patra rasena krāmaṇa artham upari lepayet

original: tataścullitale nidhāpayet
analyzed: tatas culli tale nidhāpayet

original: aṅgulopari mṛttikāṃ dattvā upari vahninā gṛhapākādikaṃ kartavyaṃ dinatrayaṃ yāvat
analyzed: aṅgula upari mṛttikām dattvā upari vahninā gṛha pāka ādikam kartavyam dina trayam yāvat

original: tata uddhṛtya punaḥ pādāṃśaṃ bījaṃ dattvā uddharet
analyzed: tatas uddhṛtya punar pāda aṃśam bījam dattvā uddharet

original: tatpatraṃ tadā dalaṃ bhavati, sārdhakena viśiṣṭaṃ svarṇaṃ bhavatītyādibuddha bhagavatoktam, aparaṃ vistaraṃ na likhitam || 223 ||
analyzed: tat patram tadā dalam bhavati sārdhakena viśiṣṭam svarṇam bhavati iti ādi buddha bhagavatā uktam aparam vistaram na likhitam

original: idānīṃ śarīrārthināṃ rasāyanamucyate- koṣṭhaśuddhistriphalasamarasaṃ kvāthitenodakena ghṛtamadhusahite lahacūrṇai: saptāhaṃ auṣadhyā māritairvai sasūtaiḥ
analyzed: idānīm śarīra arthinām rasāyanam ucyate koṣṭha śuddhiḥ triphala sama rasam kvāthitena udakena ghṛta madhu sahite laha cūrṇaiḥ sapta aham auṣadhyā māritaiḥ vai sa sūtaiḥ

original: godugdhaiḥ śālibhakterbhavati navaciraiḥ pakṣamadhye narāṇāṃ bhukteḥ śākāmlahīnairlavaṇa virahitemaṃtsyate lāgnimukteḥ || 224 ||
analyzed: go dugdhaiḥ śāli bhakteḥ bhavati nava ciraiḥ pakṣa madhye narāṇām bhukteḥ śāka amla hīnaiḥ lavaṇa virahita imaṃtsyate

original: saptāhamityādi
analyzed: sapta aham ityādi

original: iha yaḥ kaścid baddharasaṃ bhakṣayati tadā tena prathamaṃ koṣṭha śuddhiḥ kartavyā
analyzed: iha yaḥ kaścid baddha rasam bhakṣayati tadā tena prathamam koṣṭha śuddhiḥ kartavyā

original: sā ca triphalāsamabhāgakvathitenodakena virecanaṃ kartavyam
analyzed: sā ca triphalā sama bhāga kvathitena udakena virecanam kartavyam

original: lavaṇāmlarahitaṃ śālibhaktaṃ dugdhena pathyaṃ kartavyam
analyzed: kartavyam

original: tata auṣadhyā māritairlohacūrṇeriti nirguṇḍyā māritaistīkṣṇacūrṇaiḥ ghṛtamadhusahitaiḥ sasutaiḥ sumṛtasūtakatulyaiḥ, tadevākṣamātraṃ pratidinaṃ bhakṣaṇīyaṃ pathyaṃ godugdhairnavaciraṃriti prathamagoprasūtaiḥ, bhuktaḥ purātanaiścirairiti
analyzed: tata auṣadhyāḥ māritaiḥ loha cūrṇeḥ iti nirguṇḍyāḥ māritaiḥ tīkṣṇa cūrṇaiḥ ghṛta madhu sahitaiḥ sa sutaiḥ su mṛta sūtaka tulyaiḥ tat eva akṣa mātram pratidinam bhakṣaṇīyam pathyam

original: evaṃ pakṣa- madhye koṣṭhaśuddhirbhavati, śālyādibhirbhaktaiḥ śākāmla hone lavaṇavirahitairmatsyatailāgni- muktaḥ
analyzed: evam pakṣa madhye koṣṭha śuddhiḥ bhavati śāli ādibhiḥ bhaktaiḥ śāka amla lavaṇa virahitaiḥ matsya taila agni muktaḥ

original: tato rasaṃ bhakṣayet || 224 ||
analyzed: tatas rasam bhakṣayet

original: jñātvā sāhasravedhī śataguṇitaśataṃ koṭiveghī ca yāvad bhoktavyaḥ sarṣapāṃśāt pratidinasamaye cāntimo rājikāṃśaḥ
analyzed: jñātvā sāhasra vedhī śata guṇita śatam koṭi veghī ca yāvat bhoktavyaḥ sarṣapa aṃśāt prati dina samaye ca antimaḥ rājikā aṃśaḥ

original: vimalaprabhāyāṃ [ jñāna- prāsādaṃ bhūmiveśma prabhavati rahitaṃ śītavātātapeśca ṣaṇmāsairdivyadehaṃ valipalitagataṃ madhyamo'yaṃ karoti || 225 ||
analyzed: vimalaprabhāyām jñāna prāsādam bhūmi veśma prabhavati rahitam śīta vāta ātapeḥ ca ṣaṣ māsaiḥ divya deham vali palita gatam madhyamaḥ yam karoti

original: *[ jñātvā sāhasraveṣī śataguṇitaśatamiti lakṣavedhī, koṭivedho ca yāvad bhoktavya iti
analyzed: jñātvā sāhasra veṣī śata guṇita śatam iti lakṣa vedhī ca yāvat bhoktavyaḥ iti

original: sahasravedhī pratidinaṃ yavamātraṃ bhoktavyaḥ
analyzed: sahasra vedhī pratidinam yava mātram bhoktavyaḥ

original: lakṣavedhī sarṣapamātram, koṭivedhī rājikāmātram
analyzed: lakṣa vedhī sarṣapa mātram koṭi vedhī rājikā mātram

original: evaṃ cāntimo rājikāṃśaḥ
analyzed: evam ca antimaḥ rājikā aṃśaḥ

original: iha rasabhakṣaṇāya prāsādaṃ dharaṇyantaḥ prāsādaṃ vā śītavātātapaiśca rahitaṃ jñeyam
analyzed: iha rasa bhakṣaṇāya prāsādam dharaṇī antar prāsādam vā śīta vāta ātapaiḥ ca rahitam jñeyam

original: evaṃ candrodakādye śikhini viṣajale śailabhallātatoye durgandhābhūmiśaile'pi ca viṣapalaleṣvanyakalpeṣu mantrī ||226 ||

iha yadā rasājīṇaṃ bhavati, tadā bandhakarkoṭī devavālī trikaṭuka- bṛhatī nimbapatra kirātatiktam, ebhiraṣṭāvaśeṣaṃ toyaṃ kvāthaṃ kvathanamityucyate

analyzed: nāginyaḥ sādhayitvā tu amṛta phala rasāḥ oṣadhīḥ sādhanīyāḥ ḍākinyaḥ sādhayitvā parama bhaya karāḥ ca asurāḥ sādhanīyāḥ
