original: evam anye te saṃskārā itivacanād vāyvādīnāṃ dhātvindriyāṇāṃ nirā- varaṇatā veditavyā dvitīyaśūnyena
analyzed: evam anye te saṃskārāḥ iti vacanāt vāyu ādīnām dhātu indriyāṇām nirā varaṇa tā veditavyā dvitīya śūnyena

original: tatastṛtīyaṃ śūnyaṃ vedanānirodhaḥ sraṣṭāram ityādinā taṃ visagaṃ namāmi iti paryantam, “anyā sā vedanā itivacanāttejo dhātvindriyādīnāṃ nirāvaraṇateti tṛtīyaṃ śūnyam, tataścaturthaṃ śūnyaṃ saṃjñānirodhaḥ śuklam ityādinā bindu- rūpaṃ namāmi iti paryantam, anyā sā saṃjñā itivacanāt toyādidhātvindriyādīnāṃ nirāvaraṇateti catuthaṃ śūnyam
analyzed: tatas tṛtīyam śūnyam vedanā nirodhaḥ sraṣṭāram ityādinā tam visagam namāmi iti paryantam anyā sā vedanā iti vacanāt tejaḥ dhātu indriya ādīnām nirāvaraṇa tā iti tṛtīyam śūnyam tatas

original: tataḥ pañcamaṃ śūnyaṃ rūpanirodhaḥ cinmātram ityādinā vajrasattvaṃ namāmi iti paryantam, anyattadrūpam itivacanāt pṛthivyādidhātvindriyāṇāṃ tatkulīnānāṃ nirāvaraṇateti
analyzed: tatas pañcamam śūnyam rūpa nirodhaḥ cit mātram ityādinā vajra sattvam namāmi iti paryantam anyat tad rūpam iti vacanāt pṛthivī ādi dhātu indriyāṇām tad kulīnānām nirāvaraṇa tā iti

original: asya vistaraḥ prathamalokadhātupaṭale uktaḥ tenātra na vitanyata iti
analyzed: asya vistaraḥ prathama lokadhātu paṭale uktaḥ tena atra na vitanyate iti

original: pañcākṣaro mahāśūnyaḥ ( nā0 saṃ0 10.2 ) tato “binduśūnyaḥ ṣaḍakṣara: ( nā0 saṃ0 10 2 ) iti dharmasyāsyādhārabhūto buddhabimbalakṣaṇaḥ sarvatraidhātuka- tryadhvavartīti
analyzed: pañca akṣaraḥ mahā śūnyaḥ nā saṃ tatas bindu śūnyaḥ ṣaṣ akṣara nā saṃ iti dharmasya asya ādhāra bhūtaḥ buddha bimba lakṣaṇaḥ sarva traidhātuka tri adhva vartī iti

original: asya nirodhaḥ ṣaṭskandhādayaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśaddhātavaḥ kṣarajñānaṃ saptatriṃśaditi
analyzed: asya nirodhaḥ ṣaṣ skandha ādayaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśat dhātavaḥ kṣara jñānam saptatriṃśat iti

original: eṣāṃ nirāvaraṇatā dharmakāyo dharmodaya ucyate
analyzed: eṣām nirāvaraṇa tā dharmakāyaḥ dharma udayaḥ ucyate

original: caturtho vajraḥ pañcākṣaraḥ
analyzed: caturthaḥ vajraḥ pañca akṣaraḥ

original: anayonirmāṇaṃ nirmāṇakāya:
analyzed: anayoḥ nirmāṇam nirmāṇakāya

original: nānā ṛddhidarśako dharmadeśako dhvaniḥ sambhoga iti
analyzed: nānā ṛddhi darśakaḥ dharma deśakaḥ dhvaniḥ sambhogaḥ iti

original: atra eko naikospi caikaḥ samaviṣama ityādinā madhyamakasiddhāntaḥ
analyzed: atra ekaḥ na ekaḥ api ca ekaḥ sama viṣamaḥ iti ādinā madhyamaka siddhāntaḥ

original: yaḥ sarvādhāra eka iti sarvo mahākṣara - sukhaḥ, tasyādhāra eka ākāśalakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ sarva ādhāraḥ ekaḥ iti sarvaḥ mahā akṣara sukhaḥ tasya ādhāraḥ ekaḥ ākāśa lakṣaṇaḥ

original: subhaga ityaiśvaryādiguṇātmakaḥ
analyzed: subhagaḥ iti aiśvarya ādi guṇa ātmakaḥ

original: varabhaga iti dhātukottamaḥ
analyzed: varabhagaḥ iti dhātuka uttamaḥ

original: tena kāraṇena namaste śirasā nama iti namaskāro bhavatu, te iti tava mañjuśriyaḥ || 246 - 248 ||
analyzed: tena kāraṇena namaḥ te śirasā namaḥ iti namaskāraḥ bhavatu te iti tava mañjuśriyaḥ

original: so'haṃ yo martyaloke vyapagatakaluṣaḥ śrīgururvajradhārī nūnaṃ tasyāparādhād bhavati hi narakaṃ prāṇināṃ nātra citram
analyzed: saḥ ham yaḥ martya loke vyapagata kaluṣaḥ śrī guruḥ vajradhārī nūnam tasya aparādhāt bhavati hi narakam prāṇinām nā atra citram

original: tuṣṭo'haṃ tasya tuṣṭayā kupita iti mahāṃstasya kopānalena sattvānāṃ saiva mokṣa : samasukhaphalado vandyapūjyaḥ sutānām || 249 ||
analyzed: tuṣṭaḥ ham tasya tuṣṭayā kupitaḥ iti mahān tasya kopa analena sattvānām saḥ eva mokṣa sama sukha phala daḥ vandya pūjyaḥ sutānām

original: kaḥ pāpī śrīguroryaḥ sucaraṇakamalaṃ vandate na trikālaṃ ko'jñānī yastrikālaṃ bahuvidhakusumaimaṃṇḍalaṃ no karoti
analyzed: kaḥ pāpī śrī guroḥ yaḥ su caraṇa kamalam vandate na tri kālam kaḥ jñānī yaḥ tri kālam no karoti

original: ko'vīci yāti śīghraṃ samasukhadaguroḥ khedamutpādako yaḥ kaḥ prajñājñānalābhī varagurucaraṇaṃ yo na muñcatyanaṣṭaḥ || 250 ||
analyzed: kaḥ vīci yāti śīghram sama sukha da guroḥ khedam utpādakaḥ yaḥ kaḥ prajñā jñāna lābhī vara guru caraṇam yaḥ na muñcati anaṣṭaḥ

original: ko naṣṭo yastrināḍyāmapi gatamarutā māryate'nantakālaṃ kaḥ śūro mārayed yaḥ samaviṣamapathi prāṇamāpānavāyum
analyzed: kaḥ naṣṭaḥ yaḥ trināḍyām api gata marutā māryate nanta kālam kaḥ śūraḥ mārayet yaḥ sama viṣama pathi prāṇam āpāna vāyum

original: ko dātā śrīguroryo dadati nijatanuṃ putradārādi sarvaṃ ko nīco vañcako yaḥ svahṛdaya kaluṣākṛṣṭacittaḥ śaṭhaśca || 251 ||
analyzed: kaḥ dātā śrī guroḥ yaḥ dadati nija tanum putra dāra ādi sarvam kaḥ nīcaḥ vañcakaḥ yaḥ sva hṛdaya kaluṣa ākṛṣṭa cittaḥ śaṭhaḥ ca

original: paṭale, 248-258 ślo
analyzed: paṭale ślo

original: ] nānopāya vineyamahoddeśaḥ
śrīmān śrīdharmacakre suravaranamite viṣṭare viśvavarṇe tasmin buddhopaviṣṭo gadati narapate tantrarājādibuddham
analyzed: śrīmān śrī dharmacakre suravara namite viṣṭare viśva varṇe tasmin buddha upaviṣṭaḥ gadati narapate tantrarāja ādi buddham

original: candrapraśnāvabodhe tridaśana ra guruyaṃcca sattvārthaheto- staccedānīṃ mayā te gaditamapi kalāpe'lpatantraṃ hi sūrya || 252 ||
analyzed: candra praśna avabodhe sattva artha hetoḥ tat ca idānīm mayā te gaditam api kalāpe lpa tantram hi sūrya

original: buddhoktāt kālacakraṃ gaditamapi mayā sragdharāvṛttabandhe- rasya tvaṃ deśanāṃ vai kuru kuliśadharīṃ mantriṇāṃ puṇḍarīka
analyzed: buddha uktāt kālacakram gaditam api mayā sragdharā vṛtta bandhe rasya tvam deśanām vai kuru kuliśa dharīm mantriṇām puṇḍarīka

original: prajñājñānasya lābhī saravimunikulaṃ ve yathāsmadbabhūva evaṃ sattvā bhavantu trividhabhavagatāḥ kālacakraprasādāt || 253 ||
analyzed: prajñā jñānasya lābhī saravi muni kulam yathā asmat babhūva evam sattvāḥ bhavantu trividha bhava gatāḥ kālacakra prasādāt

original: sūryaṃ tvaṃ vā narendra tvaparagatabhave kālacakrekayogā- jjāto'smin brahmavaṃśe yaśanṛpatirahaṃ mañjughoṣaḥ priyā me
analyzed: sūryam tvam vā narendra tu apara gata bhave kāla cakra ika yogāḥ smin brahma vaṃśe yaśa nṛpatiḥ aham mañjughoṣaḥ priyā me

original: śrītārā pauṇḍarīkaḥ sakalaguṇa nidhirlokanātho'bjacihno nālenendīvarasya svaparagatabhavaṃ paśya sarvaṃ yathārtham || 254 ||
analyzed: śrī tārā pauṇḍarīkaḥ sakala guṇa nidhiḥ lokanāthaḥ bja cihnaḥ nālena indīvarasya sva para gata bhavam paśya sarvam yathārtham

original: nālenendīvarasya svaparagatabhavaṃ vīkṣya sarvaṃ yathāthaṃ sūrya: sādhaṃ munīndreḥ samukuṭaśirasā kalkinaḥ pādapadmam
analyzed: nālena indīvarasya sva para gata bhavam vīkṣya sarvam sūrya muni indreḥ sa mukuṭa śirasā kalkinaḥ pāda padmam

original: hastābhyāṃ vandayitvā vadati munikulaṃ raudrasaṃsāraduḥkhā- duddhṛtya jñānamārge paramakaruṇayā sthāpayet tvekaśāstā || 255 ||
analyzed: hastābhyām vandayitvā vadati muni kulam raudra saṃsāra duḥkhā duddhṛtya jñāna mārge parama karuṇayā sthāpayet tu eka śāstā

original: | vṛddho'pi tvaṃ kumāraḥ sakalajina suto'pyādibuddhastvamādī strīsaṅgī brahmacārī paramakaruṇayā lokabandhurya māriḥ
analyzed: tvam kumāraḥ sakala jina sutaḥ pi ādibuddhaḥ tvamādī strī saṅgī brahmacārī parama karuṇayā

original: saumyo'pi tvaṃ suvajrī maraṇabhayaharastvaṃ sadā māramāro mukto'pi tvaṃ bhave'smin praviśasi jagataḥ pācanārthaṃ yaśastvam || 256||
analyzed: tvam su vajrī maraṇa bhaya haraḥ tvam sadā māra māraḥ tvam bhave smin praviśasi jagataḥ pācana artham yaśaḥ tvam

original: sūryo'haṃ brahmavaṃśe munikulanamitaḥ pātitaḥ pādamūle sattvānāṃ mokṣahetoḥ prakaṭitamavanī kālacakraṃ samastam
analyzed: sūryaḥ ham brahma vaṃśe muni kula namitaḥ pātitaḥ pāda mūle sattvānām mokṣa hetoḥ prakaṭitam avanī kālacakram samastam

original: kalkīgotre tvamarkaḥ kṣitipatinamitaḥ śrīyaśaḥ śrīkalāpe yuṣmatpādāravindaṃ śaraṇamadhigato raudrasaṃsārabhītaḥ || 257||
analyzed: kalkī gotre tvam arkaḥ kṣitipati namitaḥ śrī yaśaḥ śrī kalāpe yuṣmad pāda aravindam śaraṇam adhigataḥ raudra saṃsāra bhītaḥ

original: vaiśākhyāṃ porṇimāyāṃ niśisamayagate vāsare cāpraviṣṭe mudrāsiddhiṃ gato'rko manijanasahito'dhiṣṭhito viśvabhartrā
analyzed: vaiśākhyām niśi samaya gate vāsare ca apraviṣṭe mudrā siddhim gataḥ rkaḥ mani jana sahitaḥ dhiṣṭhitaḥ viśvabhartrā

original: vimalaprabhāyāṃ [ jñāna- sattvānāṃ mokṣahetoḥ sakalabhuvigataṃ cittavatraṃ yathā me sattvānāmeva yātu trividhabhavagataṃ kālacakraprabhāvāt ||258||
analyzed: vimalaprabhāyām sattvānām mokṣa hetoḥ sakala bhuvi gatam citta vatram yathā me sattvānām eva yātu trividha bhava gatam kālacakra prabhāvāt

original: tantrārthaṃ deśayitvā paramakaruṇayā sarvasattvārthakartā putrasyājñāṃ dadāti pravaraguṇanidhiḥ puṇḍarīkasya nūnam
analyzed: tantra artham deśayitvā parama karuṇayā sarva sattva artha kartā putrasya ājñām dadāti pravara guṇa nidhiḥ puṇḍarīkasya nūnam

original: kartavyaṃ pustakasthaṃ sakalamavikalaṃ tantrarājaṃ tvayādau ṭīkāṃ kṛtvā tato vai parapadagamanaṃ svecchayā lokabandhoḥ || 259||
analyzed: kartavyam pustaka stham sakalam avikalam tantrarājam tvayā ādau ṭīkām kṛtvā tatas vai para pada gamanam sva icchayā lokabandhoḥ

original: ūdhvaṃ ye bodhisattvāḥ paramabhayakarā mārapakṣe sthitānāṃ daityānāṃ matryaloke diśividiśigatāḥ krodharājāḥ sabhāryāḥ
analyzed: ye bodhisattvāḥ parama bhaya karāḥ māra pakṣe sthitānām daityānām diśi vidiśi gatāḥ krodha rājāḥ sa bhāryāḥ

original: pātāle ye phaṇīndrā grahapadamaśubhaṃ sarvadā bandhayanti te sarve pālayantu pratidinasamaye'jñānalokaṃ samantāt || 260 ||
analyzed: pātāle ye phaṇi indrāḥ graha padam aśubham sarvadā bandhayanti te sarve pālayantu prati dina samaye jñāna lokam samantāt

original: sattvānāṃ mokṣahetojinapatigaditaṃ deśitaṃ yanmayā ca tantraṃ śrokālacakraṃ laghutaramakhilaṃ vajrasattvādhidevam
analyzed: sattvānām mokṣa hetoḥ jinapati gaditam deśitam yat mayā ca tantram śrokālacakram laghutaram akhilam vajra sattva adhidevam

original: prajñopāyaikayogaṃ jinapati kuliśeḥ ṣoḍaśākāratattvaṃ sattvāḥ puṇyena tenākṣaraparamasukhaṃ yāntu tasmai namo'stu || 269 ||
analyzed: prajñā upāya eka yogam jinapati kuliśeḥ ṣoḍaśa ākāra tattvam sattvāḥ puṇyena tena akṣara parama sukham yāntu tasmai namaḥ stu

original: idānīṃ kālacakadeśaka guṇādikaṃ so'hamityādi sarva subodham ||249 - 261 ||
analyzed: idānīm guṇa ādikam saḥ ham ityādi sarva su bodham

original: [22[b] [iti] mūlatantrānusāriṇyāṃ laghukālacakratantrarājaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrikāyāṃ vimalaprabhāyāṃ nānopāyavineyamahoddeśa- śvaturthaḥ samāptaḥ | saṃbuddhavyākṛtena pravaramunigaṇaṃ sthāpitaṃ buddhamārge dattvā prajñā'bhiṣekaṃ paramakaruṇayā deśitaṃ kālacakram
analyzed: iti mūla tantra anusāriṇyām laghu kālacakra tantrarāja ṭīkāyām dvādaśa sāhasrikāyām vimala prabhāyām nānā upāya vineya mahā uddeśa samāptaḥ saṃbuddha vyākṛtena pravara muni gaṇam sthāpitam

original: yenoddhṛtyādibuddhādidamiṣupaṭalaṃ mañjuvajreṇa tantraṃ rājñā śrīkalkinā'haṃ suta iha yaśasaḥ śrīkalāpe nṛpo'sya || paṭale, 258-261 ślo. ] nānopāyavineya mahoddeśaḥ pramuditamanasā śrīyaśaścoditena saṃbuddhavyākṛtena ṭīkāṃ śrīmūlatantrasphuṭakuliśapadānveṣikāṃ tantrarāje
analyzed: yena uddhṛtya ādi buddha ādi dam iṣu paṭalam mañjuvajreṇa tantram rājñā śrī kalkinā ham sutaḥ iha yaśasaḥ śrī kalāpe paṭale nānā upāya vineya mahā uddeśaḥ pramudita manasā śrī

original: kṛtvā puṇyaṃ yadāptaṃ vipulamatisitaṃ puṇḍarīkeṇa dānāt sambuddhastena lokaḥ prabhavatu sakalo vajriṇo labdhamārgaḥ || * | samāpteyaṃ ṭīkā jñānapaṭalasya | || samāptā bimalaprabhā ṭīkā || * gha
analyzed: kṛtvā puṇyam yat āptam vipulam ati sitam puṇḍarīkeṇa dānāt sambuddhaḥ tena lokaḥ prabhavatu sakalaḥ vajriṇaḥ labdha mārgaḥ samāptā iyam ṭīkā jñāna paṭalasya samāptā bimalaprabhā

original: ye dharmā hetu prabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat
analyzed: ye dharmāḥ prabhavāḥ hetuḥ teṣām tathāgataḥ hi avadat

original: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
analyzed: teṣām ca yaḥ nirodhaḥ evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ

original: deyadharmo'yaṃ pravaramahāyānayāyinaḥ sthavirama sya yadatra puṇyaṃ tadbhavatvācāryopādhyāya- mātāpitṛpūrvaṃgamaṃ kṛtvā sakalasattvarāśeranuttarajñānaphalāptaya iti
analyzed: deya dharmaḥ yam pravara mahāyāna yāyinaḥ sthaviram sya yat atra puṇyam tat bhavatu ācārya upādhyāya mātā pitṛ pūrvaṃgamam kṛtvā sakala sattva rāśeḥ anuttara jñāna phala āptaye iti

original: mahārājādhirājaśrīmaddharivarmadevapādīyasaṃvat 39 sūryagatyā āṣāḍhadine 29 ekonatriṃśatimite vatsare harivarmaṇaḥ

original: māghasya kṛṣṇasaptamyāmekādaśadine gate ||
